author: {'steamid': '76561198279803741', 'num_games_owned': 1418, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 1906, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1167, 'last_played': 1525917382}
review:
This game is A W E S O M E....
i don't remember where/when i got it but i sure am glad i gave it a shot..

Simple,,fun,,no complaints..
i didn't notice any slow/mediocre load times, & i didn't notice it to be a CPU hog either like a reviewer mentioned..
I am downloading Transformers season1 <1984 on Utorrent and had explorer open & didn't notice a thing.
Weird to think a tiny game would obstruct enough for one to mention it..
Unless one we're reaching for negative...

IT does get harder around the 7 or 8th mission.
Esp when you're still noob & you have no idea what enemies are coming @ you..

If you like simple tower defense games similar then you will like this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095905694', 'num_games_owned': 1380, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 371, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1528299637}
review: Vüdunuzun içinde mikroplara karşı savaştığınız kule savunması tarzı küçük bir oyun. Bölüm sonu kazandığınız haplar ile çeşitli güçlendirmeler alabiliyorsunuz. Ayrıca her kulenin yükseltmeleri oyun ilerledikçe açılıyor. Türün severleri için alınıp oynanabilecek bir oyun fakat mobil oyundan port olduğu için pek tatmin edici değil.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044797961', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 216, 'playtime_forever': 2888, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2888, 'last_played': 1523828490}
review:
A good little Tower Defense game. The graphics are nice, above the genre average, and backgrounds are decent, but drawings, as the own product cover and tutorial images, are quite ugly: there are a lot of worst products with much better cartoons. Runs fine windowed or/and in resolutions below 1300 px, at full screen with more resolution may crash without powerfull hardware. The concept is cool and remarkable: the human body defense from his microscopic lethal enemies; real as same life. 

The mechanics is classic, quick to learn and fun to play, with only 4 kind of towers but well made: each one has 2 o 3 specializations with 3 to 6 enhances, well depicted, different and usefull. There are 3 powers autorechargeables by time, and a system of gems and tablets to get enhances and power-ups to use ingame. Also, player can choose a hero with 3 upgradable skills by level, max 50. The foes are evil viruses and nocive substances; there are 20 well knowed types, like nicotine, alcohol, common cold or flu, and 3 bosses, better not name them. The difficulty modes are well designed, result balanced and challenging. 

Sadly, game is short: to complete campaign of 16 maps, with 100% of achievements in all modes, takes about 30 hours, the additional 2 maps may require more time for discover how: the last one has 160 hordes of foes! Highly recommendable for children and newbies. Hopefully the designers make a second part more extense; but please with a new cartoonist. Try to buy with a big discount: is free for mobiles.

author: {'steamid': '76561198128460864', 'num_games_owned': 1898, 'num_reviews': 186, 'playtime_forever': 1781, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1751, 'last_played': 1521821536}
review:
[h1]This is a great TowerDefense game, the whole idea of "playing" your immune system is awesome.[/h1]

There are only [b]20 stages[/b], each represent a part of your body  but available in [b]3 difficulties[/b]. The stages itself have [b]specials related to the bodypart[/b] (e.g Lots of booster pads to place your tower on in the liver or a very long linear track in the leg).
There is no real tutorial and you unlock more upgrades over the first few levels and the level itself fit perfectly to use this newly aquired skill/tower, which kind of works like a tutorial.

There are plenty of different enemy units such as angina or cancer each being more difficult the more it is an [b]enemy to the actual body[/b]. e.g.[spoiler](cancer is the endboss)[/spoiler]

You have your [b]basic tower loadout.[/b] Which could be a little bit more creative.
-fast shooting ranged low dmg
-slow shooting ranged hight dmg
-spawning units that hold up enemies
-Splash dmg range medium dmg

All of them represent a cell or anti-body of your immunesystem.
Place these towers on pre-set platforms and upgrade them with oxygen, which is your currency.

Also there are special[b] "Heroes"[/b] that represent a strong fighter in your body. You can manualy contoll the Hero and earn experience for killing things with it. Heroes are essential because the game gets [b]quite hard[/b]later on.
Sometimes you have to replay the level many times to [b]grind [/b]some gems (you can buy boosts for your towers with them) and exp for your hero, this sucks and gets [b]very boring sometimes.[/b]

Especially for the achievement "Super hero" you have to grind for hours to get it. [b](watch my guide on that)[/b]


Overall this is a good TD game, tho very simillar to others like "kingdom rush", brings an creative design and theme spin to it.
The steep difficulty curve makes it hard for beginners in this genre to get into but very nice for advanced players. Later on it gets a little bit repetitive but only if you want all of the achievements.

[h1]Give it a try![/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561197984240274', 'num_games_owned': 2708, 'num_reviews': 460, 'playtime_forever': 398, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 398, 'last_played': 1521057918}
review:
Jako wielki fan gier typu Tower Defense, jestem bardzo zawiedzony tym tytułem.

Sam pomysł wydaje się spoko - polem walki jest ciało człowieka, którego próbujemy bronić przed kolejnymi rodzajami wirusów, bakterii i chorób.

Niestety, optymalizacja jest tak beznadziejna, że na komputerze gdzie mogę odpalić dowolną produkcję w "ULTRA", notorycznie zdarzają się spadki płynności (a grałem w 1024x768 w oknie, strach co by było gdybym odpalił FullHD na pełnym ekranie).

Do tego sam gameplay jest o tyle irytujący, że częstokroć trzeba wracać do poprzednich misji, by przejść je na hardzie, aby mieć dość silną armię/bonusy, by przejść kolejne zwykłe misje. Przy okazji często przyciski są niersponsywne lub zasłaniają część trasy wroga, przez co traciłem kolejne życia, gdy nie mogłem zrzucić na przeciwnika bomby.

Generalnie nie polecam, grafika jak z gry F2P na telefon, niestety gameplay dużo gorszy, a optymalizacja kuleje.

author: {'steamid': '76561198349440337', 'num_games_owned': 1627, 'num_reviews': 200, 'playtime_forever': 335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1586338080}

author: {'steamid': '76561198295255781', 'num_games_owned': 679, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 2043, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2043, 'last_played': 1520101109}
review:
Típico juego de Defensa de Torres donde tendremos que construir torres y barreras para eliminar las hordas de enemigos que tratarán de llegar al final del trayecto para derrotarnos. La temática es original, estaremos en el interior del cuerpo humano tratando de evitar que diferentes enfermedades, infecciones o dolencias superen a las defensas del cuerpo humano.

Es un juego entretido y que está bien a pesar de ser un port del típico juego diseñado para smartphones con todas las limitaciones que eso conlleva. La dificultad del juego está bastante bien ajustada y hay niveles que suponen buenos retos con diversos tipos de enemigos pero como punto negativo diría que hay poca variedad de torres.

A los amantes de los juegos de Defensa de Torres les podrá otorgar unas cuantas horas de juego.

author: {'steamid': '76561198157906427', 'num_games_owned': 2619, 'num_reviews': 179, 'playtime_forever': 1979, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1979, 'last_played': 1519128664}
review:
Firstly, let me start by saying I love tower defence games, I've been playing them well over 15 years and in that time I probably played almost every single browser based TD game and the majority on Steam.

That out of the way, let me say this game infuriates me beyond belief, the game is a mobile port, a port of a "freemium" game that is free to download on tablets and phones where money is earned by the sale of "gems" (and probably ads as well). 

They make this money by having the first handful of levels fun to play, the hook if you will, then the difficulty ramps up and you are no longer able to complete levels in one play through as the game is geared to force you to grind, or in the case of the mobile version cough up some cash.

No effort has been made to alter the recipe from the mobile version and as such it is oft impossible to play through and get a high score to unlock upgrades before progressing to the next difficulty, rinsing and repeating.

Instead, you have to grind (as there's no micro transactions), you have to play through on easy, upgrade, play through again on easy getting 3 stars, switch to medium difficulty, play through, upgrade and play through again to get 3 stars etc, etc.. and what started as a fun game quickly becomes a tedious chore you just wish would end.

It should also be noted that the game is incredibly short, in the sense that by modern TD game standards, it has very few levels, its actual length entirely revolves around the need to grind and repeat each level twice on each of the three difficulties.

My next complaint is regarding the defenders (the towers you build that spawn troops/soldiers), these defenders will only engage enemies in their direct path (that literally walk into them), they do not intercept enemies within the tower range. This is seriously annoying and I have lost count of the number of times I had to restart a level as a mob waltzed passed within a hairs breath of a group of defenders who just waved as they passed.

My final complaint is regarding game performance, in later levels on hard difficulty performance (FPS) starts to take a noticeable hit and in the final level (the brain) by the end of the level my i7 6700, 32GB, 980 Ti rig was producing a mere 9, yes NINE frames per second.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041990871', 'num_games_owned': 882, 'num_reviews': 254, 'playtime_forever': 100, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1517902954}

author: {'steamid': '76561197999888555', 'num_games_owned': 196, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1517856090}
review:
Ahh I remember this game... let me tell you my story...

>stroll into my local GameStop
>looking to pick up maybe a copy of just this game, my lust and passion has craved for 
>grab the game and gallop towards the register when my trained eye notice a charming maiden
>-"Pardon me, milady....but could you ring me up? A Shame I don't have your number, or i'd ring you up instead..."
>she giggles and takes the game, blushing as her fingers brush mine due to my fingerless gloves
>her eyes widen as she reads the game's title
>"Wow, I've never seen anyone buy this before! You must have a special taste!"
>I smile and ready a witty response when... SUDDENLY a voice rings out from behind
>-"AHAHAH look what this ****** is buying! That's not EA Star Wars Battlefront! What a piece of ****!!!11one"
>I quickly turn around, my cloak billowing behind me, to discern the source of the rude outburst..
>generic dudebro caricature with a sports team cap and "the guy that beat you up that one time behind the school in early October" shirt is standing there guffawing..
>-"Excuse me sir.....you may disparage my person if you wish, but it is untoward to swear in front of a lady"
>-**** you ******!"
>I smile quietly and tip my fedora low across my eyes, concealing them...
>-"As you wish..."
>I quickly swing my cane into his kneecap before he can react
>he bellows and charges forward
>I expertly sidestep him and the cashier screams as he crashes into the counter
>I draw my sword-cane and mutter a quiet oath as I drive it deep into his back
>-"...requiescat in pace...."
>As I clean my blade the girl walks out from behind the counter, twirlig her hair with her fingers, bumping up in front of me and I inhale as her lady parts jumps up and down like my heartbeat..
>-"So... maybe you'd like to come over to my place to play that game sometime...?"
>I smirk, and whisper "No thanks, milady. I prefer single player. Besides...."
>I sheath my sword..
>-"You're not my type."
>*grab my dew and dorros, skate away on my Heelys*

author: {'steamid': '76561198041457591', 'num_games_owned': 1625, 'num_reviews': 208, 'playtime_forever': 210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 210, 'last_played': 1516653839}
review:
Okay...I'm not very knowledgeable of tower defense games, but it certainly has it where it counts. I found myself wanting to replay earlier levels on harder difficulties to get more tablets to upgrade myself for later levels, which is always a good sign. And while initially there isn't much interaction with the game board (you just build towers), that gradually adds as you gain powers, get more upgrade possibilities and a hero (there might be even more further down the line).

Against it, I have to say that the game (as mentioned elsewhere) looks like a flash game. I can't deny it: it has simple, colorful sprite graphics and rather bad optimization (I get a "hall of mirrors"-effect left of the playing screen, and the game slows down a bit when there's a lot going on). In terms of effects, you see more effort put in the trailer than perhaps the entire rest of the game. Then again: it's five bucks. And what is there is functional. Minimalistic, but functional.

The theme is pretty fun. It could've been executed better (oxygen and tablets make sense, but why does it also have diamonds as payment option?), but the result is kind of like those "once upon a time...life" cartoons.

Finally: the gameplay: I found the difficulty much harder than I expected it to be. Yes, at first you've got barely any options which is boring, but after a couple levels you really can't just sit back and let your towers do the work anymore. The normal and hard difficulties...maybe I'm just bad at this genre, but I feel they are meant to be played after you've unlocked and added some upgrades from later levels, as they become nigh impossible.

All in all, the game is quite addicting, and more than decent for its price point. It may just be a mobile port (there's no right clicking or use of a button anywhere), but at least it's of a good game. :-)

author: {'steamid': '76561197999459739', 'num_games_owned': 1127, 'num_reviews': 548, 'playtime_forever': 1213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1213, 'last_played': 1516434464}

author: {'steamid': '76561198028357706', 'num_games_owned': 897, 'num_reviews': 153, 'playtime_forever': 1369, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1369, 'last_played': 1515844698}
review:
Przyznam, że lubię gry pokroju Tower Defense i byle średniak jest w stanie mnie wciągnąć, w przypadku Defend Your Life mam to samo, tylko odpalę grę i ciężko się oderwać, ale do rzeczy. Tak jak wspomniałem gra jest typowym Tower Defense, który ciekawie zrobiono, choć nie jest bez wad. Na początku, gdy odpaliłem grę wyskoczyło mi typowe dla gier zrobionych w silniku Unity okienko konfiguracji, gdzie ustawimy rozdzielczość, jakość grafiki i inne rzeczy, a gdy już ustawiłem to co chciałem kliknąłem Play i moim oczom ukazało się menu główne rodem z gier na telefony mobilne, dodatkowo nieco brzydkie oraz dwa czarne paski po bokach(serio?), mniej dziwne się to robi, gdyż gra jest portem z Androida czy iOs. 

Choć wygląda to z początku tak sobie to na szczęście dalej jest lepiej, bo sam gameplay prezentuje się całkiem ok, cała gra odgrywa się w ciele człowieka w różnych częściach ciała, a naszym zadaniem jest po prostu nie dopuścić by cokolwiek przeszło przez naszą linię obrony a w tym celu mamy do dyspozycji 4 rodzaje wieżyczek, które mają różne drzewka ulepszeń, niektóre wieżyczki mają 2, a nawet 3 drzewka ulepszeń, a kupujemy je za tlen, który dostajemy z generatora oraz za zabite jednostki. Mamy tu różnorodnych przeciwników np. szybkie, ale słabe robaki, czy wolne, ale wytrzymalsze wirusy, ale to tylko początek, bo jest tego więcej no i są też więksi przeciwnicy, czyli bossowie, którzy są bardzo wytrzymali i niebezpiecznie potężni, w grze jest ich tylko dwóch, z czego drugi to finałowy boss, który pojawia się też w jednym dodatkowym poziomie. W grze występuje 15 poziomów + 2 bonusowe, niby mało, ale późniejsze poziomy trwają po 30 minut nawet grając na prędkości x1, ponieważ mają po nawet 40 fal, nie mam się też przyczepić co do wolnych miejsc dla wieżyczek. Do pomocy poza wieżyczkami mamy też 3 power-upy, takie jak bomba czy adrenalina, które można użyć ponownie po naładowaniu oraz płatne za klejnoty pomoce typu więcej kasiory, zresetowanie power-upów i inne rzeczy. Mamy też do dyspozycji bohatera walczącego wręcz, którego mozna rozwijać, no i może przytrzymać w miejscu wrogą jednostkę oraz ją rozwalić, odblokowuje się dopiero po pierwszym bossie. Mamy co prawda do wyboru 5 różnych herosów, ale ich różnice polegają tylko na statystykach i wyglądzie, no i tylko jeden jest dostępny na początku resztę trzeba odblokować za klejnoty, czyli walutę w grze zdobywaną poprzez pokonywanie poziomów. Poza klejnotami dostajemy też tabletki, które pozwalają nam kupować rózne ulepszenia na stałe dla wierzyczek, power-upów czy do zwiększenia ilości zdobywanego tlenu.

Graficznie gra wygląda całkiem ładnie, dobra stylistyka i kreskówkowy klimat, muzyka choć nie ma jej wiele to nie jest jakoś irytująca, choć dźwięki już mogą być, choć te odgłosy naszych wrogich bakterii są całkiem zabawne.

W sumie poza takim kiepskim początkiem nie miałbym nic do zarzucenia... a nie, jest jeszcze jedna rzecz, optymalizacja. Choć co do działania gry nie mam wiele do zarzucenia to jedna rzecz rzuca się w oczy, czyli optymalizacja. Mimo, że przez większość gry nie uświadczymy poważnych ścin to nieco później gra zaczyna się przycinać, można to trochę wcześniej zauważyć, gdy zwiększymy tempo rozgrywki, w sumie zmiana prędkości gry też jest skopana na swój sposób. Tak to nie mam więcej uwag.

Plusy:
+Ładna stylistyka
+Muzyka, choć jej nie wiele to rzecz na którą raczej bym nie narzekał
+Zabawne dźwięki stworków
+Różnorodni przeciwnicy
+Starcia z bossami
+Ciekawy pomysł na rozwój wieżyczek
+Sterowalny bohater
Neutralne:
+-Typowy gameplay mobilnych Tower Defense
+-Średniawa optymalizacja
+-Kolejny port z urządzeń mobilnych dodatkowo na silniku Unity(nie mam nic do Unity, ale zawsze jak widzę gównianą grę to pierwsze co widzę to okienko konfiguracji Unity) pozbawiony mikropłatności
Minusy:
-Gra mimo obsługi rozdzielczości z przedziału 16:9 odpala się w przedziałce 4:3, co skutkuje czarnymi paseczkami po bokach
-Menu główne, które raczej jest przystosowane do ekranów telefonów czy tabletów niżeli dużych monitorów
-Nie ma tu dużo poziomów, jedynie dłużą się masakrycznie przez ilość fal

Mimo tego mylnego pierwszego wrażenia, że będzie to kolejny kiepski port na silniku Unity gra mnie zaskoczyła i wciągnęła na nieco czasu, nawet zdobyłem wszystkie osiągnięcia, choć nie były one trudne do zdobycia, co po prostu wymagały czasu. Mamy tu typowy Tower Defense z paroma ciekawymi rozwiązaniami i ciekawą stylistyką, moja ocena to 7,5/10, nie był to stracony czas i myślę, że warto dać grze szanse, jak nadal nie wiecie czy kupić to zawsze możecie pograć na telefonie z Androidem czy iOS za darmo, ale z mikropłatnościami.
PS. Znowu przesadziłem z długością recenzji, ale co zrobię, że nie umiem inaczej :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198254946397', 'num_games_owned': 85, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 315, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 315, 'last_played': 1512856843}
review:
Поначалу я не решалась стать куратором для этой игры. Однако, тщательно прошерстив Steam на наличие годных TD, я решила изменить свое мнение к ней на резко благосклонное.
Игра Defend Your Life вобрала в себя лучшее, что есть в играх жанра TD от студии Creobit. Здесь имеются как умеренная казуальность, так и вполне обильная хардкорность. Различных строений, вражеских NPC и особых умений также предостаточно, что не может не сказаться на ее тактической составляющей. Также в игре присутствуют несколько видов валюты - как внутриигровых (вроде здоровья и денег, именуемых здесь "кислородом"), так и валют микротранзакций (кристаллы и монеты, за которые можно улучшить древо талантов или купить особые вещи). Также есть альманах по зданиям и монстрам, что роднит Defend Your Life с небезызвестной Kingdom Rush. 
Геймплей. В игре присутствует три уровня сложности и целая куча разнообразнейших уровней. Также здесь имеется возможность менять скорость игры, что является вполне стандартной опцией для всех современных TD.
Ну, и напоследок можно отметить, что место действия в данной игре крайне специфическое и незаурядное - человеческий организм. Мы вынуждены строить, развивать и оборонять молекулы ДНК и лекарственных препаратов, дабы противостоять полчищам злобных молекул всевозможных болезней - начиная от ангины и заканчивая каким-нибудь сифилисом. Что лично мне напомнило такой великолепный старый мультфильм как "Осмосис Джонс". 

Вердикт: Красивая увлекательная TD с довольно необычным сюжетом и атмосферой. Рекомендовать ее можно всем - как поклонникам жанра, так и для тех, кто лишь хочет ознакомиться с ним.

А ежели Вам понравился данный обзор, то смело вступайте в группу ♥ Nomie Games ♥, полностью посвященную моим игровым обзорам.
Также кликните на значок "Подписаться на куратора", поскольку именно для этого группа и создавалась.

review: Este es un juego al estilo Tower defense (van viniendo oleadas de enemigos y has de evitar que lleguen al final). La diferencia es que lo han ambientado en el cuerpo humano y lo que van viniendo son bacterias y virus. Es ese aspecto me parece bastante original y se hace bastante entretenido. Además consigues ciertos "HEROES" que te ayudan a detener las oleadas. Al pruincipio parece bastante sencillo, pero a medida que vas avanzando la cosa se complica y te hace pensar.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000053151', 'num_games_owned': 120, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 154, 'last_played': 1514408742}
review:
Played almost all levels in easy mode, here are my thoughts:

- Good walkthrough, you will never feel lost
- Various attack methods
- Each level introduces you a new challenge
- Large set of upgrade options for you weapons, health, etc.

You will have also excellent Windows 10 support, but strangely the game opens in 4:3 mode. I also think that 5€ is too much for this game, OK I know the game works very well and you have a lots of things to do, but still this is just one "Miniclip" game on steroids. Buy it when it's on sale.

For 2,50€ or less, I tottally recommend this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003795030', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 1390, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 760, 'last_played': 1515081911}
review:
[b]Defend Your Life: TD[/b] ist im Grunde ein [i]Kingdom Rush[/i]-Klon [1] [2], aber leider kein Guter. Das Setting im menschlichen Körper wirkt auf den ersten Blick gut umgesetzt. So werden keine Orks oder Zombies bekämpft, sondern Viren, Bandwürmer, oder Alkohol. Zu Beginn macht [b]Defend Your Life: TD[/b] echt Laune, die Level spielen sich "fluffig". Jedoch zieht der Schwierigkeitsgrad in der Mitte des Spiel von einem auf das andere Level enorm an. So enorm, dass von Unausgewogenheit gesprochen werden kann. Sind die Level am Anfang noch in jeder erdenklichen Bau-Konfiguration (auch mit nur einem Turm-Typ) spielend zu lösen, so gibt es zu Mitte des Spiels kaum noch neue Bau-Möglichkeiten, die ich noch nicht versucht hätte. ...wobei, da ist doch eine Möglichkeit: In-game Transaktionen. Keine Sorge, hier muss niemand Echtgeld investieren - aber dafür jede Menge Zeit. Es wirkt schlicht so, als ob die Entwickler gemerkt hätten, ihr Spiel sei zu kurz. Und so entschied man sich zum einem, die Zahl der Wellen innerhalb eines Levels mal eben so auf um die 50 anzuheben (wo es vorher so 10-20 waren), und zum anderen, neue (unfaire) Gegner-Typen auf einen loszulassen. Da kommt es schonmal vor, dass man das Level bei Welle 49 verliert, wo man noch bei Welle 48 der Meinung war, das Level sei einfach. Na vielen Dank.
Dann warte ich doch lieber bis es ein neues [i]Kingdom Rush[/i]-Spiel in den Steam-Store schafft.

[1] [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/246420/Kingdom_Rush/]http://store.steampowered.com/app/246420/Kingdom_Rush/[/url]
[2] [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/458710/Kingdom_Rush_Frontiers/]http://store.steampowered.com/app/458710/Kingdom_Rush_Frontiers/[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198106869661', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1512965116}
review:
I thought it was an okay, albiet slightly boring TD game, until I found out this is basically a shameless reskin of a game called Kingdom Rush.

Really disappointing, I'm glad I didn't actually pay for this, and just got it out of a bundle, still, to base your game on one that is already free, and try and peddle it as your own is just bad practice in general, and is frowned upon in my eyes.

If you want to play this game, go and find the flash game I mentioned, its actually pretty popular from what I know, surprised I didn't find this out sooner.

If you want to know what the gameplay is like, for a good 20 minutes or so, you'll still be playing the tutorial, and they don't let you buy whatever upgrades whenever you want, and its not like its a: "introduce a tower, so you can't buy upgrades just yet", most of the time, you'll find yourself literally playing one level at a time waiting until the game decides  to unlock one of the upgrades in the whole tree, very tedious.

tl;dr shameless clone of an online flash TD that is free, worse give it that, buy at your own volition

author: {'steamid': '76561198208078171', 'num_games_owned': 723, 'num_reviews': 553, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1514091859}
review:
Not really worth $5 it seems. $3 is probably closer to it's true value.

It is a generic tower defense game. It's not bad, but it does nothing new. It has nothing to really set itself apart, outside of the theme. 

It's not bad, like I said. But I would definitely vote neutral if possible.

Edit: Just want to throw this out there before I forget, it lagged sometimes. Now, with a machine that could run the old PUBG with 60 frames, there is absolutely no reason i should have ever dropped below 60 frames on here, much less the 28 it went down to during some of the points. Fix that.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073346321', 'num_games_owned': 965, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 35, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1513532402}
review:
I really wanted to like this game, but it's just a generic Tower Defense. Nothing note worthy they're doing. Has all the signs of a developers first game.

That's not to say it's bad. TDs are hard to screw up. They just played it super safe. It would have been nice if they had been more inovative.

author: {'steamid': '76561198131980970', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1513226259}
review:
Nice graphics and theme but let down by the fact that ultimately the theme doesn't impact on gameplay much - it's more of a typical tower defense game with a themed skin. Average at best in terms of gameplay particularly as you have very limited tower placement positions and no way to redirect enemy pathing which limits variety of playthroughs, however the graphics and theme tying the enemies and towers together keeps it interesting for a few hours.

[Received as part of the Humble Bundle Yogscast Jingle Jam 2017 bundle]

author: {'steamid': '76561198231764136', 'num_games_owned': 281, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 34, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1512785579}
review:
Wasn't already a fan of mobile games being converted to PC, but i'd thought i'd should try it out thanks to humble bundle and the funny art style.
But this game isnt just made for a PC/Steam game.

The gameplay is basic, not challenging enough.
It lacks upgrades for the towers and you can't really try different tactics.
The game has micro transactions so you can buy more health or troops for one or more rounds.
It should have stayed in google play store, it's boring and made fo young childeren.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034670583', 'num_games_owned': 953, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 2029, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2029, 'last_played': 1512714744}
review: Плагиат безжалостный шедевра - Kingdom Rush. С хкдожественной точки зрения отталкивает ущербная картинка, будто бы накаляканая в попыхах ребёнком. Ну ведь тут молвят, что поёдёт, как отличный ТД. Соглашусь, но присутствует некий дисбаланс. PS зачем разработчики ввели уровни сложности, непонятно.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019524853', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 245, 'last_played': 1512502932}
review:
After reading some of the reviews i tried to give this game a fair chance, but it just isnt fun. 

The difficult is punishingly difficult, even after replaying previous levels for extra upgrade points, it feels like more of a puzzle game than a tower defence. Find the one stratagy of tower placement and types that will allow you to beat the level or fail.

It is quite clearly a mobile game ported to pc but it seems to run well enough and the interface is perfectly usable, one anoyance i found was certain menus, the tower descriptions and hints & tips sections of the encyclopedia open a link in your web browser, why this info couldnt be ingame in beyond me.

Overall i cannot recomend this game, its a very basic tower defence with the same tower types youve seen before ( rapid, slow but high damage, slowing/blocking, aoe and buffing tower) with fairly generic enemy types. The only interesting thing i noticed with one enemy [spoiler]Alcohol A (slow but high hp)and Alcohol B(fast but low hp) will physicly join on touching to become AlcoholAB which is both fast with high hp[/spoiler] but apart from that one inovative thing this game is generic and bland.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021303887', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 190, 'playtime_forever': 836, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 836, 'last_played': 1512729605}
review:
Un bon petit tower-defense pour ma part, sans prétention, qui pêche malheureusement par sa technique.

Les + :
+ Un jeu qui se joue sans prise tête.
+ Utiliser le corps humain comme aire de bataille est plutôt original comme idée.
+ Le jeu se prends bien en main.
+ Un tarif pas trop excessif vu le nombre d'heures vous attendant.

Les - : 
- Graphiquement pas folichon.
- Des ralentissements quand trop d'unités sont affichées à l'écran, ce qui est assez inadmissible vu les graphismes.
- Des soucis de gameplay, comme des clics sur les bonus qui ne prennent pas, dû au ralentissement.

Bref, malgré quelques tares techniques je recommande quand même ce jeu qui reste pour moi un bon tower-defense.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044741994', 'num_games_owned': 1546, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 552, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 552, 'last_played': 1512369245}
review:
When I first saw this, I thought it’d be a great Tower Defence with a Human Anatomy twist. It essentially is but it’s quickly comes to nothing more than that and here’s why:

Pros:

♦ No bugs that I’ve personally found (Great as everything seemingly works)
♦ Graphics and artwork are fitting for the game (Nothing special but fit for what the game offers)
♦ Sound is fitting (Again nothing spectacular but fitting)
♦ Can speed the game up to 4x (This is great s it makes the game less long and drawn out. However, it doesn’t speed it up enough see cons for more)
♦ Decent time waster (If you have nothing to do, this is great to pass the time. However, it’s not a game that can be idled or played for 5mins and then put down)
♦ Standard Tower Defence (If all you are after is a standard tower defence with nothing special or spectacular beyond the Human Anatomy artwork and graphics, then this is great) 
♦ Great level designs, towers and enemies etc based on Human Anatomy (This is adds a great visual touch to the game, but doesn’t add much else to the gameplay)
♦ Strategy element is great (This is great as you have to have a certain strategy to beat levels on harder difficulties. However, strategy seems based on difficulty and there only seems to be one or two strategies that work for some difficulties - see cons for more)
♦ Can get your monies worth (I say this as I’ve played 8hours for $5 which is decent. However, you might get bored of the grindy, upgrade simulator and repetitiveness and not get your monies worth)
♦ Easy Achievements and has Trading Cards (Achievements are grindy but easy to get if you can be bothered)
♦ Level difficulty challenges are a great addition (Could be too hard though)

Cons:

♦ Slow and repetitive (Levels seem slow and very repetitive. This is because enemies hardly change during a level and you just fight the same handful repeatedly, towers are the same throughout the whole level and there seems to be too many waves for the round. Hence, a few waves into a level you’re sitting there wishing the level would end already)
♦ Feels like an upgrade simulator (This is because once you try to play the game on higher difficulties or progress through a few waves on any difficulty, it feels like you’re forever clicking to upgrade towers which is very slow and tedious as there is no fast way to upgrade them except by clicking on each tower individually numerous times)
♦ Strategy is based on difficulty (This is terrible because it seems as though there is one or two tower placements that work on harder difficulties and you spend numerous attempts just trying to figure out what placement is the best rather than finding a tower combo that works well together)
♦ Not many enemy types or tower upgrades (New units and tower types are added as you progress. However, they seem to cap early on and you seem left with the same 4 towers which you can only fully upgrade a few times in certain levels. This is annoying as you’ve explored all tower types before you’ve even finished the game and explored 90% of enemies before you’ve even finished the game)
♦ No way to tell before you start a level what enemies you will be facing (Some towers only affect certain enemies and there is no way to tell which tower affects what enemy and which enemy you will be facing in a wave until you face it. This is terrible as it makes planning towers early on almost impossible)
♦ Can get all achievements but the hero level achievement before you 100% the game (This is weird, as before you’ve beaten all levels on hard difficulty you can have 100% the game)
♦ Encyclopedia takes you to an external website to view towers, tricks and tips etc (This should be all incorporated into a menu within the game. There should be no outside website links loaded)
♦ Impossible to buy all champions without 100%ing the game and grinding (This is annoying because there is no replay value once you’ve 100%ed the game, so trying out the champions you haven’t unlocked is silly).
♦ Pill ratings per level make no sense (I can beat the level on easy and get three pills for that level. I would have thought to get 3 pills I would have had to have completed it on hard difficulty)
♦ Looks 100% like a mobile game that is poorly ported to PC (I say this as there is no pc options, graphics settings or anything to make it look like a pc game beyond the steam integrated features such as Trading Cards and Achievements)
♦ Doesn’t add anything new to the tower defence genre (It’s basically place a few towers, upgrade when you can and hope you’ve placed the towers in the right spot. Then you just must wait until the huge number of waves are finished. Needed to add a spin on the genre to make it stand out)
♦ No reason to replay (This is because once you beat all the levels on hard, if you can bother there is no reason to ever play the game again)
♦ No reason to play a level on any difficulty other than easy (I say this as unless you want coins or upgrade points early on there is no incentive to play on a harder difficulty. Plus, the harder difficulties are the same level just more waves and less lives and less money for towers. Also, there is an occasional tower restriction which doesn’t add much more. There is nothing that stands out that makes playing on a harder difficulty unique)

Overall, as there is nothing unique added to the Tower Defence genre beyond the Human Anatomy aspect and the fact the game feels like a grindy, long and drawn out upgrade simulator that you can only win harder difficulties by using a set strategy by the devs and not by finding a tower combo that works… I can’t recommend this game even for $5. However, if you like a basic mobile style Tower Defence that will give you some hours of play… then feel free to pick this up. However, it wasn’t for me and I can’t really recommend it for most.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997711695', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1512288141}
review:
I gotta say this is just... really, really bad. You take one of the most stale genres out there (tower defense), steal nearly all of the gameplay from one of the most popular entries in that genre (Kingdom Rush), implement it poorly enough that there are control issues and lag despite ultra-simplistic gameplay, throw in a bizarre theme that feels like some third-graders won a contest to have their game idea made real, and kick the grindiness the genre is known for up an extra notch to push it over the edge.

I can't think of any reason anyone would play this instead of any other tower defense game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120775255', 'num_games_owned': 372, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 59, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59, 'last_played': 1512271786}
review:
This game's difficulty curve is wild - switching from easy to medium feels less like adding one level of difficulty and more like squaring the difficulty. It's similar for the levels - they quickly escalate. The enemies are crazy - they have quite high health and you don't receive currency fast enough to keep a stable defence in anything but the slowest speed of easy. It also feels quite gated. Most upgrades are locked behind a future level, and once you can use an upgrade, it still isnt available in the previous levels. As well, you can only place towers in a handful of certain spots, which seem to only support only a few strategies to win. It would be more entertaining to select where I can place towers. 

Some of the cool things that this games does are the little blocker men, who don't really deal damage but trap enemies in a certain spot so you can kill them with other towers, and it's got a pretty cool theme.

Honestly, this game feels a bit like a mobile game that's been semi-badly ported over - I'm not sure if it is, but I wouldn't be suprised if it wasn't.

I feel like I should state that, while I did pay for this game, it was received via the Yogscast Jingle Jam 2017 Humble Bundle, and I didn't actively select it. Overall, on a scale of 1 to 13, I think I would rate this game a solid 5. That's 38%! If you enjoy exceptionaly difficult TD games, give it a try, but if you just play TDs casually like me then maybe give it a miss - unless it's decently on sale. Have a great day. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198061663275', 'num_games_owned': 408, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 14, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1512258285}

author: {'steamid': '76561198003832203', 'num_games_owned': 470, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 10, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1512242851}
review:
It's not a bad game per say, but it clearly has a school-project/mobile-esque feeling about it, which in my opinion shouldn't be this abruptly translated to pc. There is a lot of optimization-issues and a really clunky UI, with no hotkey configuration, which doesn't really help with the mobile-feel.

As said, it's not bad, it's just not polished enough for pc. If it was on mobile, I would have recommended it, but not on steam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054382565', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 778, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 778, 'last_played': 1509308654}
review:
I really enjoyed this TD.  

It is simplistic, it has a bit of a learning curve, but honestly it was fun. 
Well worth the price & the entire concept was great. 

Pro(s):
Fun stages
Fun achievements
Fun characters
Fun Heroes 
Clean & crisp visuals. 
Unique TD concept world
Different variations to beat the same stage. 
Level progression isn't too bad

Cons:
 Some times it can feel a bit "grind heavy" but it doesn't last too long. 
It takes a large amount of currency to obtain the "heroes", thus you'll just find yourself saving up for the "strongest" one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046840300', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1508696199}
review:
«Защищай свою жизнь» - призывает эта игра своим названием. И в ней действительно предлагается взглянуть в очень условной и упрощенной форме, как идет борьба за жизнь нашего организма с вирусами, бактериями, а также глистами и камнями и т.д.
 
Задачи просвещения умов человеческих игра явно не имеет. Как уже заметили в других обзорах, названия вещей не очень-то продуманы. Конечно, в наших телах нет никаких башен Теслы, всякой артиллерии, бомб и болот. Непонятно, что мешало разработчику в самом деле назвать бомбы антибиотиками, их пушек стрелять лейкоцитами и т.д. Так что нельзя сказать, что игра дает какие-то полезные знания о работе организма. Тем не менее она способна вдохновить на то, чтобы почаще мыть руки.

Игра также имеет некоторые отличительные особенности. Например, чтобы разблокировать уровни якобы нормальной или повышенной сложности, сначала нужно пройти так называемый легкий уровень сложности.
 
Графика игры – мультяшная, но в принципе вполне добротная. Оптимизация – хорошая, чувствую ледяной воздух из радиатора  ноутбука. Интерфейс… Ну, если не считать того, что игра наполовину на английском, наполовину на русском, довольно сносно выглядит. Так неужели я наконец вижу достойную и приятную компьютерную игру на движке Unity?!  Ах, нет… Большие проблемы с балансом. Поначалу все кажется просто. Но внезапно оказывается, что уровень Почки нельзя пройти. Притом, что построены все башни, все прокачаны до максимального уровня, и все это мощные и дорогие башни с поддержкой. Пробовала раз 10 с разными комбинациями башен. Но в конце появляется камень, и башни не могут его остановить. Тогда остается только 2 варианта пути. Либо надеяться на удачу и играть, пока эти Почки не окажутся уже в печенках. Либо [strike]бросить игру[/strike]  использовать донатные бонусы. Второй вариант, кажется, единственное, что поможет пройти дальше. И вот это положение дел, когда нельзя закончить уровень обычными средствами, которые доступны в игре, я считаю весьма несправедливым. Хотя здесь непосредственно нет доната, но хотелось ведь просто поиграть в Tower Defense, придумывать какие-то стратегии. А когда понимаешь, что победа – это вопрос, сколько у тебя игровой валюты, то становится как-то неинтересно…

author: {'steamid': '76561197962099132', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 31, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1498906597}
review:
[h1]Defend Your Life: TD ist ein Towerdefense/Gelegenheitsspiel.[/h1] 
Der Schwerpunkt liegt in einzelnen Leveln auf der Verteidigung des menschlichen Körpers. Man schlüpft gewissermaßen in die Rolle der körpereigenen Abwehrkräfte. In den einzeln zu bespielenden Leveln kann man auf vorbestimmten Punkten Abwehrtürme verschiedener Art bauen. Hat man dies getan, starten die Viren/Bakterien und sonstiger Schmodder auf einer Seite und versuchen in möglichst großer Zahl bis ans andere Ende zu gelangen. Damit dies nicht gelingt, kann man seine Verteidigungstürme aufrüsten und später auch diverse "Superfähigkeiten" einsetzen. Viel mehr gibt es nicht zu tun. 

[b]Aufmachung des Spiels:[/b] 
Sämtliche Grafiken sind in einem Cartoonstil gehalten, was insgesamt humorvoll, süß oder immerhin sympathisch hätte sein können. Hier ist es leider nichts davon. Abgesehen von einzelnen Leveln, wirkt alles eher lieblos. Ähnlch verhält es sich mit den Animationen der Türme und Bakterien/Viren/Krankheitserreger. Das ist einfach schlecht gemacht und wurde in kostenfreien Flash-Browser-Spielen schon besser umgesetzt. Der Sound ist okay, wobei er sich dem Rest anpasst und seine positivste Eigenschaft die ist, dass er nicht negativ auffällt. Die Steuerung ist einfach und selbsterklärend. Mit der Maus platziert man die jeweiligen Türme an den festgelegten Baupunkten, löst Fähigkeiten aus und rüstet Türme auf. Soweit unproblematisch. Mehr gibts nicht zu berichten. 

[b]Spielerlebnis:[/b] 
Man verteidigt den Körper gegen schlecht gezeichnete und animierte Krankheitserreger. Die Möglichkeiten dabei sind schnell ausgeschöpft und sehr begrenzt. Irgendwann sind alle Bauplätze belegt und alle Aufrüstungen an den Türmen abgeschlossen, dann heißt es nur noch: darauf hoffen, dass die Abwehrkräfte ausreichen. Zwischen den einzelnen Leveln werden einem immer wieder neue Dinge erklärt und Fähigkeitenverbesserungen angeboten. Interessant dabei hätte sein können, dass es spezifische Informationen zu den einzelnen Krankheitserregern gibt, die in Textboxen dargestellt werden. Diese Informationen sind allerdings leider nur kurze lieblose Texte, die keinen Mehrwert oder Wissenszuwachs bringen und somit einigermaßen überflüssig sind. 

[b]Mein Urteil:[/b] 
Es braucht insgesamt nicht viel für ein abwechslungsreiches und spannendes Towerdefense-Spiel. Grafik und Sound sind dabei nicht so sehr entscheidend wie Bau- "Maze-" und Uprademöglichkeiten sowie eine gute Balance, verschiedene Erfolgsformeln, um fordernde und schwere Level zu bezwingen, etc.. Das bietet Defend Your Life: TD leider viel zu wenig. Und da weder die Grafik noch der Sound unglaublich positiv herausstechen, was immerhin effektvoll fürs Auge gewesen wäre, kann ich dieses Spiel nicht empfehlen.

Defend Your Life funktioniert vielleicht als Gelegenheitsspiel zwischendurch für ein paar Minuten, schafft es aber nicht, einen in den Bann der Turmverteidigung zu ziehen. Grafik und Sound sind auf sehr niedrigem Niveau. Spielspaß solala. Abwechslung marginal. Kann man ausprobieren, ist aber meiner Meinung nach nicht fesselnd und bietet kaum Argumente, häufiger gespielt zu werden.

author: {'steamid': '76561198110533185', 'num_games_owned': 730, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 1029, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1029, 'last_played': 1502099503}
review:
人間の体内を舞台にしたTDゲー
キャラクターがいかにもバタ臭いが中身はすごい普通

ユニット数は少なくてシンプル、ほどよく使い分けが必要
一人操作できるキャラクターがいて意外と操作は忙しい
敵の回復ユニットとか優先して倒したい敵を狙ったりできるけど
クリックの判定が微妙でその割にストップとかないので不便だった

成長要素あるけどすごいゆっくりだし
まぁ面白いけどカジュアルな見た目の割に意外と難しい方だと思う
一応オススメ、セールやバンドル入りで手に入ったら箸休めみたいな感じで崩すといいかも

author: {'steamid': '76561198071035278', 'num_games_owned': 3181, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 2021, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2021, 'last_played': 1502789014}
review:
30个小时全成就，居然也耐着性子打完了。。。
这游戏玩法上唯一的亮点恐怕就在于背景设定是在人体，然而这并没有什么用，也没有引申出与人体相关的对应玩法，只是把其他塔防游戏里面的资源换成了氧气，敌人换成了病毒，换汤不换药。玩法上没有任何特色，在一众塔防游戏中属于中等，玩这个不如去玩王国守卫。
这个游戏的优点在于自带简中，多次进包价格便宜，无聊的时候点开玩玩也能打发时间，可以一试。

author: {'steamid': '76561197991262582', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 599, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 599, 'last_played': 1501370829}
review:
Interesting theme, but the game really didn't work for me. I'm a little surprised by the overwhelming positive reviews, even by people that have put a lot of time into it and wonder how many others they've played. It is very inexpensive and will give you some challenge, but I'm not sure it's the type of challenge I want from a TD. I don't want to grind just to upgrade heroes, I want to be challenged to find that right mix of towers to get past a level. The difficulty ramps up a lot by the mid-game but mostly due to overpowered creeps and gimmicks. 

Contrast this to Last Hope or Kingdom Rush, which also have you grind a bit for heroes but not as badly and are for me the more interesting games with more varied levels and goals. I'm not even going to mention Defense Grid. Oops. 

It won't cost you much to try if you love TD games, and the grind will give you many hours of cheap entertainment (and cheap frustration), but you've probably played more interesting ones.

author: {'steamid': '76561198109670840', 'num_games_owned': 886, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 1243, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1153, 'last_played': 1500506787}
review:
Very solid game. Learning curve is well done. There are not a lot of different tower types but the ones that exist are well designed. All are useful which opens a lot of possible tatics to complete each level.
Hero mechanics are also very good even though you kind need to go from Hero 1 to the last one since the others seem to add little value.
Upgrade system also makes sense and most the upgrades (exception here being the "sell" one - which is only realy useful in a couple of levels) are useful.

Overall, a great game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198064599677', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 250, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 250, 'last_played': 1498953768}
review:
Very cute tower defense game that is educational as well. At first the small limit on towers seems boring, the germs seem weak and then the game blossums. The towers develop and branch out, the germs and baddies start to have special traits and abilities. And the level of difficulty slowy ramps up until you will struggle with levels. This isn't mindless like Balloon TD or the like. 

And the best part is the entire game takes place inside the human body.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028015450', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 107, 'playtime_forever': 2837, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 519, 'last_played': 1655748502}
review:
A nice Tower Defense game.

Nothing totally original and creative but a nice time waster for probably 5 hours or more if you want to play all levels on each of the three difficulties. 

The graphics and the music are okay for this type of a game and the price. I bought it during the summer steam sale in 2017 for 49 cent and am happy with it so far. Am most likely going to play it through after beating the first 6 levels.

I bet this developer team could do an awesome Dr Mario clone with the Defend Your Life theme.

Edit October 2020:

Where is the Covid-19 Expansion? Joke aside, I replayed the game, eventually beat that dastardly Brain level and got all trophies except the level your hero to level 50 ones..since it was not neccessary. Stick to my opinion, this game is a nice Tower Defense game, however it really could use some optimation since its getting slow from certain rounds on.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057419562', 'num_games_owned': 1050, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2449, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2449, 'last_played': 1498144222}

author: {'steamid': '76561197970439781', 'num_games_owned': 693, 'num_reviews': 112, 'playtime_forever': 3215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3215, 'last_played': 1501424787}
review: Defend Your Life: TD is a tower defence (TD) game set inside the body of a patient on an operating table. You take control of the body's immune system to fight off waves of tapeworms, flu viruses, alcohol and other nasties. The game has the look of a 1970s educational cartoon. The graphics aren't actually bad. They're just a bit cringeworthy. However, there is a deliberate irony about the visual style and it's actually quite charming in some ways. For example, one of the hero units you can buy is based on the Incredible Hulk. As a TD game, it's quite well balanced and has the right mix to make it addictive fun. One slight drawback is that the menu sits on the right hand side of the screen and obscures the place where the creeps exit, which can cause great frustration when you can't click where you want to.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006934852', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 111, 'playtime_forever': 2267, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2267, 'last_played': 1432877647}
review:
Well-balanced tower defense set inside an especially compromised immune system.

Tower upgrades and improvements include the usual suspects, with a decent difficulty curve.

DYL is not genre-redefining but is evident of solid design (frame rate drops on busier maps notwithstanding).


- [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/6887038-Skinny-from-the-Fat-Bastard/lists/]Skinnyfat Lists[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198028932184', 'num_games_owned': 577, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 2213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2178, 'last_played': 1496514935}
review:
I like this game! It remembers me of an old educative cartoon that I watched in the Saturday mornings.
It's fun to get rid of several different diseases, with nice towers and a nice balance. You can play the challenge as high as you want, since every organ has 3 different levels.
Finally, the heroes are fun and cute. I've never thought that Hulk smashes and cuts with a nice axe!
So, it is a nice Tower Defense game if you like this kind of games, and a nice try if you don't like it!
^_^

review: A Tower Defense game for PC, Android and iOS. It is actually pretty nice and I have enjoyed it more than any other TD in the last few years. Absolutely amazing Tower Defence game, Simple, and fun to play.This game is really creative and addicting to play!

author: {'steamid': '76561198126162408', 'num_games_owned': 118, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1166, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 661, 'last_played': 1545566461}
review: pokud máte rádi strategie tak je tato hra rozhodně pro vás,hra je docela dobře propracovaná,máte tam i speli které zabijí bakterie třeba elektřinu,bombu a adrenalin který když píchnete do některých z vašich zbraní tak budou střílet rychleji,mise nejsou zase až tak moc obtížné no jenom když si to nedáte na obtížnost hard,ale štve mě že tu hru vlastnim už tak cca 2 roky ale bohužel jsem su hru nedohrál protože bohužel jsem skončil u fakt hard levelu ale jinak hra je dobrá,promyšlená a logická u týhle hry musíte rozhodně přemýšlet jinak jste dead,za každý level dostanete pilule který slouží k vylepšování vašich spelů jako je bomba,elektřina či adrenalin,dostanete i diamanty za  který si kupujete hrdiny které si samozdřejmě taky vylepšujete,ve hře občas v nějakém tom levelu se objeví nová a i občas těžce porazitelná bakterie,levely vypadají fantasticky,vypadaj propracovaně a skvěle. mínus ale je že levely jsou občas obtížné, prášky a diamanty získáte jen za to když dokončíte level a to mě docela štve hře bych dal 8,9/10.když si koupíte tuhle hru myslim si že utracených peněz litovat nebudete

author: {'steamid': '76561198192562986', 'num_games_owned': 558, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1668, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1540, 'last_played': 1645688392}

author: {'steamid': '76561197974698570', 'num_games_owned': 768, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 920, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 920, 'last_played': 1494716954}
review:
I purchased two copies, averaging $1.50 each. It was literally the best bang for my buck on Steam. Heck, I'd pay $30. The music alone makes it worth it, let alone the thrill of unlocking upgrades and facing new enemies. The graphics are beautiful, though frames drop when things get heated. The levels get slightly longer and harder as you progress. There are really no difficulty spikes when you rebeat unlocked levels for coins, which are used to permanently unlock perks. There are also diamonds you earn each level, which can buy single-use perks. Plus, you're given a few powers (like a bomb) with a downtime before re-use. The game actually warns you before playing a new level if you haven't unlocked enough perks. Unlike similar games, it will still let you play them if you dare.

This game requires you to use your head, which I love. Do you build several low-powered towers? Or a few high-powered ones? How many guard posts should you build, and where should you place them? When should you use your powers? And which one should you use? Do I have sufficient defense on the choke points?

This is my favorite single-player game on Steam, and I despise tower defense games. Ignore the negative reviews. This game is rated positively for a reason. It's a must-buy no matter your age; it even has educational value for youngsters. I will be spending a long time on this. Thank you, developers, for such an awesome, affordable game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198119121162', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 2176, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2146, 'last_played': 1493342081}
review:
A nice little tower defense game (though apparently a mobile port), where you manage resources of a human immunity attacked by a number of illnesses, toxins and maladies. Your battle scenes are various parts of body and, naturally, there are upgrades, both on map and general. There are also various heroes that you purchase for the in-game currency.
A decent game, though a bit grindy towards the end, especially if you are into achievement hunting. Happy defending!

review: Aslında Mobil olarak tasarlanmış bir oyunla karşı karşıyayız. Oyun temel özellikleriyle çok basit bir Tower Defance oyunu. Kral oyun tarzı sitelerde, Flash tabanlı oyunlar arasında bile bu kalitede bu özelliklere sahip oyunları bulabilirsiniz.Oyunun mantığı basit ama oyun bir yerden sonra zorlaşıyor. Aynı bölümleri tekrar oynayıp skill point kasmak zorunda kalabilirsiniz. Oyunun teması ise isminden anlaşılabileceği gibi bir vücudun içerisinde geçiyor. Savunduğumuz şeyler ise mikroplar. Hediye yada bedava bulduysanız deneyebilirsiniz.Onun haricinde satın almanızı tavsiye etmem.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055171179', 'num_games_owned': 231, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 1644, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1644, 'last_played': 1492967157}
review:
Defend you life TD est un Trés bon Tower Defense au graphisme colorés et plutot agreable. Chaque niveau répresentant un organe vous combatter différentes bactéries a l'aide de 4 sortes de tourelles évolutives

-La tourelle de base, bonne cadence faible dégats. On peu l'évoluer en tesla pour plus de degat au prix de la cadence ou canon rapide.
-La caserne, qui permet de former des globules qui stop les ennemis qu'ils engagent. Chaque upgrade augmente le nombre et la résistance. 
-l'artillerie, degat de zone, evolue en gros missile pour plus d'impact, ou peut générer un marais toxique qui ralentit.
-L'usine, qui elle a un role de soutient, boostant les autres tourelles dans sa zone. On a le choix entre 3 évolutions, la vitesse, la force ou la portée.

De plus l'on dispose de 3 pouvoirs pouvant être utilisé:

-la bombe, qui explose peu de temps apres avoir été posé, petite zone d'action
- l'electrochoc, qui inflige des dégats a tous les ennemis précent a l'écran
-l'adrenaline, qui permet de booster les tourelles dans une petite zone

A coté de ça, pour chaque niveau on a un générateur qui fournit un apport de ressources régulier (pouvant etre upgrade aussi) et un Héros qui lui aussi prendra de l'expérience et l'on distribue les points entre vitesse, attaque et vie. Il y'a pour le moment 5 héros pouvant être debloqué. 

De plus une fois un niveau achevé l'on reçoit des points a depenser, dans un arbre de competence général. Boost de chaque pouvoir, reduction de leur cd, augmentation de la portée ou dégats des tours, bonus d'argent en début de partie, a la revente des tours ou générer en passif.

Petit Bemol : Le Heros ne réponds pas toujours bien ainsi que la bombe et l'adrenaline.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019270397', 'num_games_owned': 4179, 'num_reviews': 733, 'playtime_forever': 182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1491927325}

author: {'steamid': '76561198026659344', 'num_games_owned': 216, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 241, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 241, 'last_played': 1491310410}
review:
Игра вроде бы и самая из жанра Tower Defence, но выполненная в антураже человеческого организма. Лично мне понравилась и по-своему затянула. В игре есть 3 уровня сложности. Уровень Hard заставит вас подумать над правильной расстановкой обороны. Так же, вы можете улучшать способности вроде больше % к очкам, за которые можно улучшать\строить пушки, или же увеличивать дальность\мощность ваших защитных сооружений. 
В общем на пару вечеров может затянуть. Моя оценка 4/5.

author: {'steamid': '76561198263427469', 'num_games_owned': 442, 'num_reviews': 246, 'playtime_forever': 161, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 161, 'last_played': 1490125184}
review:
Defend your life is a tower defense game which was inspired by Kingdom Rush.

Pros
- Unique setting. It’s not just a usual fantasy setting which is typical for TD games. You defend the human body from different viruses and bacteria. There aren’t many games in this setting, and this game is definitely the first one of this kind in TD genre.
- Although the game is a clone of Kingdom Rush, it has some new features. Magic tower has been replaced with a support tower. Each base tower can be upgraded into 2 different ones on level 1. Total number of towers is slightly higher than in KR. There are 3 skills instead of two.
- Game is simple to play
- There are game speed settings

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=888434517

Cons
- Although I found "Human Body" setting interesting, can anyone explain me what does Rocket Launcher do in my stomach? Why do bacteria wear iron helmets? I would advise to use antibiotics and vitamins instead of cannon towers. It would perfectly fit. The game looks like a lazily-done concept. My final impression about this story and setting is totally negative.
- This game was designed as free-to-play game for mobiles. There are consumable items which highly improve your defenses. Devs from KR cut these things when they ported the game to PC. But Alda Games decided to not waste their time and forced players to start the previous levels again and again to get "gems".
- Waves of each mission are short and always the same. It's pretty interesting to watch them during the first 2-3 missions. When you find out that the next levels have almost the same types of waves, you get bored.

The game is not bad. I think newcomers to TD genre would find "Defend your life" attractive. For these people I say wait for 60% discount and try it.
But I can't recommend this game for people like me who like to play innovative and interesting games enjoying every minute of the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074217869', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 487, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 487, 'last_played': 1490179429}

review:
Ne úplně klasický tower defence. I tak se dá Defend Your Life popsat. Vaší hlavní starostí je zabránit virům, bakteriím apodob., aby zničili vaše zdraví. Ve hře máte kromě věží k dospozici i hrdiny a jedním z nich je i Sterakdary. Pročpak asi, když on hru podpořil, že? :D Každopádně je to zábava, ale občas se neubráníte frustraci, když vás nějaká vlna nepřátel naprosto zmasakruje.

7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198078534696', 'num_games_owned': 752, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 225, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 225, 'last_played': 1487742136}
review:
作为TD其实是合格的——但仅仅是勉强合格，不够有趣。
应该说算是大片TD类游戏的通病了，程式化的游戏模式，非常有限的组合，模型贴图只是幌子而已，加攻减速增益放技能，不外如是。
然而有种白瞎了主题的感觉。
想看到更丰富的模式和玩法，或者讲出个有趣的故事。

author: {'steamid': '76561198254232846', 'num_games_owned': 831, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 1175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 796, 'last_played': 1527363759}
review:

review:
Catégorie : Tower defense

Les + :

author: {'steamid': '76561198025571064', 'num_games_owned': 2180, 'num_reviews': 1520, 'playtime_forever': 250, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 250, 'last_played': 1485808354}
review:
[h1] Активированный уголь [/h1]
[i] Defend Your Life: TD [/i] типичный [i] tower defense[/i], который выделяется лишь своей стилистикой, защитой организма человека от простуды, гриппа, алкоголя, камней итд. Врагов конечно напридумали разнообразных, но про венерические заболевания забыли. А вот те самые башни, которые стреляют пулями и ракетами, башни Теслы, бомба, которая улучшается до динамита и дальше до ядерной бомбы, электрошок как-то не вписываются в концепцию. Пушки например могли бы стрелять лейкоцитами, вместо шокера отвар шалфея, а бомбы поменять на антибиотики, Неужели так трудно было догадаться?
За каждый пройденный уровень дают золотые таблетки, конечно они больше похожи на всем нам привычный активированный уголь или цитрамон п. За прохождение на лёгком дают 3, а на среднем и сложном по 2, как-то не логично, награда на более высоких уровнях должна быть выше, ведь это должно служить мотивацией. Ветка улучшений различных строений и бонусов сделаны безхитростно. Удобно, что можно всегда продать не нужные на данный момент улучшения и взять другие. Можно за алмазы купить бонусы на уровень, например дополнительное здоровье.
Такая щепотка мобы: есть герои, способностей у них нет, но апгрейдить за повышение уроня на урон, скорость и здоровье можно. Чем сильнее герой, тем дороже.
Игра проста как карандаш и разобраться можно чуть ли не за 5-10 минут, не понимаю зачем нам разработчик не дал доступ ко всем сооружениям и их улучшениям с самого начала. Нет, в горле нельзя палить из ракетницы, а в печени огонь из всех стволов.
Надоело это клише, что башни можно размещать в только определенный местах, у нас что в тощем кишечнике (в игре почему-то пишется что там тонкий) каждый его сантиметр особенный чтоль, одинаковый.
С технической части игра сделана халтурно, если движок [i] Unity [/i] бесплатный и простой, это значит что надо делать тяп-ляп. Никакого разрешения на весь экран, играй с оконной полоской вверху экрана и чёрными полосами по бокам, 4:3. Системные требования не хило завышены. Если игру перевели, то меню уж переводить не обязательно. Графика скуповата, музыка надоедает, звуки орудий тоже скучные.
Не убивайте время в этой игре, купите и играйте во что-нибудь более стоящее, могу порекомендовать [i] Anomaly: Warzone Earth[/i], если не боитесь английского, лучше возьмите [i] Anomaly Warzone Earth Mobile Campaign[/i]. Переплата будет не существенна, а различия в качестве игр на лицо.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050093326', 'num_games_owned': 660, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 873, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 873, 'last_played': 1485261461}
review: Muy entretenido. Aunque no está bien balanceado del todo. Te pasas unas cuentas pantallas muy sencillas, y de golpe toca una que parece imposible. La idea es que vuelvas atras, y te pases las anteriores fases en mayor dificultad para desbloquear mas cosas, pero es que aún así no termina de funcionar. Hace falta paciencia, repetir y repetir fases, hasta que le pillas el hilo, y aprendes como pasar cada fase (además de lo dicho, desbloquear cosas y subir de nivel), para poco a poco ir avanzando. Pero como es divertido y engancha, se le perdona. Mi idea era sacar todos los logros, pero al final lo he visto demasiado coñazo. Nota: 7

author: {'steamid': '76561198031180632', 'num_games_owned': 593, 'num_reviews': 175, 'playtime_forever': 1537, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1446, 'last_played': 1485094796}
review:
Defend your Life ist ein schönes klassiches Tower Defense Spiel im Stil von Kingdom Rush. Es geht darum den Körper gegen Bakterien und Viren zu verteidigen. 

Auch hier gibt es 4 Turmarten, die man upgraden und spezialiseren kann. Zusätzlich stehen aufladbare Fähigkeiten wie z. B. eine Bombe zur Verfügung.
Man hat einen Helden, der auch levelt. 
Anstatt von 1-3 Sternen gibt es hier 1-3 Tabletten zur Belohnung und Diamaten. Mit diesen Tabletten können in einem Talentbaum Turmverbesserungen freigeschaltet werden. Man braucht nicht jede Tablette um alles freizuschalten.
Mit den Diamanten können andere Helden oder verbrauchbare Goodies gekauft werden. Es gibt keine Micro Transactionen in dieser PC Version.
Das Grinding ist zum Glück gering, einen neuen Helden muß man natürlich erstmal etwas hochleveln, aber nur auf wenigen Maps brauchte ich die verbrauchbaren Goodies.

Weiteres in Kürze:
[list]
[*]Es gibt 18 Maps
[*]3 Schwierigkeitsgrade
[*]Fast Forward
[*]Ein Gegner kann als Primärziel markiert werden
[/list]

[u]Fazit[/u]
Ein sehr schönes Tower Defense Spiel, das Spass macht. 

Mehr Empfehlungen (hauptsächlich Tower Defense Spiele):
http://store.steampowered.com/curator/8896126-Gametests-and-Videos

author: {'steamid': '76561198059595672', 'num_games_owned': 4420, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 2032, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2007, 'last_played': 1486795519}
review:
再肝十几个小时就全成就了。[spoiler]导致上班总是没时间喝水[/spoiler]
除了有中文，各方面都不如Kindom Rush的喜加一游戏。
——游戏性合格——
游戏关卡分为易中难三种，不同难度有细微的差距，想全部通关还是有难度的。[spoiler]开局要攒4000钻石买电锯狂人[/spoiler]
——换汤不换药——
小兵叫血小板勉强说得过去，但在身体里建机枪塔、特斯拉，放核弹头是什么鬼？
——英雄脆如纸——
堂堂大将军还不如小兵厉害，英雄遇到小结石直接狗带。[spoiler]反英雄主义[/spoiler]
——道具影响平衡——
游戏中的货币可以反复刷，道具的使用没有限制，直接降低了游戏难度。

author: {'steamid': '76561198086640340', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1484766820}
review: Я подбираю довольно много игр на раздачах, просто для того, чтобы поднять пару копеек на карточках, однако Defend Your Life, хоть и была приобретена бесплатна, стала одним из приятных исключений в море неиграбельных симуляторов выбивания карточек. Я посвятил данной ТД целых полтора часа, в течении которых я наслаждался незамысловатым, но тем не менее занимательным геймплеем. И вот, я открываю магазин стима, для того чтобы написать положительный отзыв, и вижу !!! ценник в 129 рублей. Игра несомненно не плохая, однако её уровень это бейсплатный байт на донат из Play market... постойте ка... отсутствует толковое описание, сложность внезапно возрастает, в игре присутствует непонятные супербусты и герои, покупающиеся за игровую валюту, которой постоянно нехватает, да и интерфейс в целом больше заточен под тачскрин; пойду ка проверю вышеупомянутую платформу... Итоги расследования: на своё портативное устройство данную игру вы можете получить абсолютно бесплатно, что я собственно и рекомендую сделать, потому что цена сей поделки явно неадекватна.

author: {'steamid': '76561198336813571', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 259, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 259, 'last_played': 1483467386}
review:
Very basic tower defense game but a very good one. I like it a lot. You have a few towers, not to much and you can upgrade them. You can also upgrade your skills like make towers stronger or increase the range. You do this by using tablets which you collect by completing levels. You can also use a "hero" which is a character of great strenght which runs around and kills the bad guys. You can level this character up by increasing it strength, HP and movement speed. This is, like I said, a very basic but good tower defense game with very nice graphics. I bought it for 0.49€ in sale and for that price it is a real bargain.

Gamplay Video: https://youtu.be/2YmA86p8LTU

author: {'steamid': '76561198011423418', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 1011, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1011, 'last_played': 1483318406}
review:
Эта игра жанра Tower Defence, в которой мы защищаем тело человека от всякой гадости в лице вирусов, бактерий, никотина, алкоголя, камней в почках, глистов и прочего. Причём защищаем, похоже, не очень, так как идём вглубь тела человека вместо того, чтобы изгонять эту гадость в обратном направлении.

Из плюсов могу отметить:
[list]
[*]Наличие героев, которые более или менее позволяют вытянуть игру, когда башенок не хватает
[*]Испытания могут быть достаточно сложны и на самом простом уровне сложности. Следующие уровни сложности могут накладывать ограничения на игрока, как отсутствие какого-либо типа башен или способности.
[/list]

Из минусов у нас имеется:
[list]
[*]Простенькая, ничем не примечательная графика
[*]Странные ветки развития башен, которых всего 4 типаю Так, например, из артиллерийской башни можно развить либо ракетную установку, либо какое-то газовое облако, наносящее урон проходящим через него врагам.
[*]Достаточно странная сюжетная линия, если её можно так назвать... Комментарии к происходящему отсутствуют напрочь.
[*]Местами корявый перевод на русский, а местами - вообще отсутствующий.
[*]Отсутствие каких-либо чекпоинтов. Проиграли на 39-й волне из 42 - извольте начать сначала.
[*]Невозможность выбора уровня сложности. Необходимо пройти миссию на простом уровне сложности, чтобы открыть средний. Самый сложный уровень открывается по прохождении простого и среднего уровней сложности.
[/list]

Не скажу, что игра совсем уж плоха: скоротать пару-тройку вечеров хватит.
Но тех денег, которые за неё просят, она не стоит. Если и брать её - то со скидкой не менее 75%.

Однако, если Вы  действительно любите данный жанр, то лучше обратить внимание на других представителей, например то же [url=store.steampowered.com/app/18500]Defense Grid: The Awakening[/url].

author: {'steamid': '76561198030643073', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 188, 'playtime_forever': 1099, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1021, 'last_played': 1429379357}
review:
This is really just a question of price and your love for the genre.  

This game is a straight up clone of a popular tower defense game that started on mobile and is even on steam at this point.  But the thing is, the cloned gameplay is fun, if a little bit shallow.

It isn't great, but I paid $1.00 for this game.  Was it worth $1.00?  Absolutely.  

If you like the genre and can get this game for cheap enough, its some cheap, harmless entertainment.

5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198233941008', 'num_games_owned': 2343, 'num_reviews': 2008, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1552940192}
review:
[h1]Defend Your Life: TD - Uma Batalha pela Sobrevivência Dentro do Corpo Humano[/h1]

Introdução:
Em "Defend Your Life: TD", prepare-se para uma batalha épica pela sobrevivência enquanto mergulha nas profundezas do corpo humano. Este emocionante jogo de defesa de torre oferece uma experiência única, desafiando os jogadores a proteger o organismo de ameaças intrusivas. Uma jornada dramática aguarda enquanto você luta contra forças invisíveis em uma busca desesperada por sobrevivência.

Defesa Estratégica da Torre:
A trama de "Defend Your Life" se desenrola nas paisagens internas do corpo humano, onde torres defensivas especializadas são suas principais armas contra invasores. Planeje estrategicamente a colocação de torres, cada uma com habilidades únicas, para impedir o avanço de patógenos, vírus e outras ameaças que buscam destruir o organismo.

Jornada Épica pelo Corpo Humano:
A ação se desenrola em diversos ambientes internos, desde o sistema circulatório até as profundezas do sistema respiratório. Cada fase apresenta novos desafios e inimigos, proporcionando uma jornada épica através dos complexos caminhos do corpo humano.

Inimigos Invisíveis, Ameaças Reais:
Enfrente uma variedade de inimigos invisíveis que representam ameaças reais para a saúde do corpo. Desde vírus astutos até bactérias persistentes, sua habilidade tática será testada enquanto você defende o corpo contra essas forças invasivas.

Atualizações e Aprimoramentos Estratégicos:
Ao progredir na batalha, ganhe recursos para atualizar suas torres e desbloquear novas habilidades. Aprimore suas defesas para enfrentar inimigos cada vez mais formidáveis e desbloqueie estratégias avançadas para garantir a sobrevivência do organismo.

Gráficos Cativantes e Detalhes Biológicos:
A estética visual de "Defend Your Life" mergulha os jogadores em um mundo biológico intrigante, repleto de detalhes e gráficos cativantes. A representação única das complexidades internas do corpo humano adiciona uma camada extra de imersão à experiência de jogo.

Recomendação:
"Defend Your Life: TD" é mais do que um simples jogo de defesa de torre; é uma jornada emocionante pelo corpo humano, onde cada decisão tática é crucial para a sobrevivência. Se você procura uma experiência única, repleta de desafios estratégicos e imersão biológica, este jogo é altamente recomendado. Prepare-se para a batalha pela vida e descubra se você tem o que é preciso para defender com sucesso o organismo contra as ameaças internas. A saúde do corpo está em suas mãos. Avante, defensor da vida!

author: {'steamid': '76561198125664030', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 381, 'playtime_forever': 511, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 511, 'last_played': 1480740911}
review:
通关撒花：人体保卫战，一款玩法全部照搬了皇家守卫军（Kingdom Rush）的2D策略塔防游戏，有后者的珠玉在前，本作就很尴尬了。游戏之间相互借鉴玩法与设定并不新奇，即使是同样的玩法，不同的作者也能用各自的创意赋予自己的游戏以新的生命。

问题在于，本作只能说是“画虎不成反类犬”，与其说它是一款新游戏，不如说是山寨缩水版的皇家守卫军。菲菲对小游戏一向持宽容的态度，但如此拙劣的“借鉴”，恕我无法苟同。处处都有借鉴，那就不是借鉴了，尤其是最后的成品质量还掉了不止一个档次。

一样是定点塔防，这个没有问题，但是，同样是4种防守塔，8种升级路线，熟悉的救场技能和加点，还有守关英雄，仅仅是给游戏换个名字，地图设定成人的身体内部，敌人改成各种对健康有威胁的疾病，这就是一个新游戏了？

在人体内部与疾病作战算是一个很有意思的点子，但问题是过于生搬硬套。敌人冠上了各种疾病的名字，特性却是天马行空，更是有凑数的嫌疑，比如伏特这种和疾病毫无关联的敌人。防守塔冠上了与人体免疫相关的名字，但也有轰击塔这种不知所谓的存在。

游戏共18关，17关以后还有一关隐藏在角落里。防守塔与敌人之间几乎看不到克制关系，平衡性更是无从谈起。每关的怪物数量特别多，最终关卡更是有160波的敌人，虽然有4倍加速，还是挺无聊的。反过来说，如果游戏有趣，加速功能根本没必要。

游戏共有5位守关英雄，但是没有职业差别的英雄就是个笑话，各个英雄只有3项属性：生命、攻击、移速，后面的英雄的属性全盘秒杀前面的英雄，也没有天赋技能。英雄升级是各自独立的，这就意味着，根本没必要一个个去练英雄，直接解锁最后的即可。

英雄脱离战斗后的回血速度慢的堪比乌龟爬，频繁的死亡导致升级速度也快不起来。敌人中的结石，特性描述是对血小板一触即死，同样适用于英雄，所以除了血厚一点之外，这个所谓的守关英雄的作用和召唤出来的士兵相差无几：都是打酱油的。

如果卡关了，很简单，刷前面的关，拿钻石买加成道具。如果说糟糕的平衡性只是降低了玩家的体验，那么这个如同开挂一样的道具系统就毁了本作的游戏性。策略的调整无足轻重，某些关卡强迫玩家去刷钱，然后无脑使用道具辅助过关，这还玩什么？

综上，拙劣的照搬其他游戏的核心玩法，牵强附会的敌人与防守塔设定，鸡肋一样的守关英雄与开挂一样的道具系统，让菲菲难以说服自己给出一个好评。如果没有玩过皇家守卫军，也许我会看在它是一个小游戏的份上给上好评，但是没有如果。

这里附上皇家守卫军的商店地址，有疑议可以自行体验与鉴别：
http://store.steampowered.com/app/246420/

Defend your Life feels like an iOS port.

Worth the 1€ in Sale.
