author: {'steamid': '76561197970704819', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 337, 'playtime_forever': 894, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 465, 'last_played': 1503040938}
review:
เป็น Tower Defend ที่สนุกมากๆ และราคาก็ถูกสุดๆ (ผมได้มา 25 บาท) ไอเดียและวิธีการเล่นของเกมนี้จะว่าโคลนเกมอย่าง "Kingdom Rush" มาเลยก็ได้ เพียงแต่เปลี่ยนธีมยุคกลางมาเป็นร่างกายมนุษย์แทน คุณจะได้เล่นเป็นระบบภูมิคุ้มกันที่ต้องต่อสู้กับเชื้อโรคต่างๆ (ศัตรูเกมนี้นั่นแหละ) ป้อมต่างๆในเกมนี้ก็ค่อนข้างหลากหลาย มีระบบอัพเกรดแพทเทิร์นเดียวกับ "Kingdom Rush" เป๊ะๆ! และนอกจากการวางป้อมต่างๆแล้วคุณยังมีความสามารถพิเศษให้กดใช้เพิ่มพลังให้กับป้อมหรือใช้อาวุธจัดการศัตรูทั้งฉาก ตัวเกมมีระบบอัพเกรดความสามารถป้อมโดยการเก็บ "ยาเม็ด" มาเพิ่มความสามารถในส่วนต่างๆด้วย อาทิ ทำให้ยิงแรงขึ้น ยิงได้ไกลมากขึ้น ยิงเร็วขึ้น ประมาณนั้น 

Defend Your Life เป็นอีกเกมที่เล่นสนุก มีการ์ดให้เก็บและยังฆ่าเวลาได้ดีมากๆ (เล่นนานๆพาลเสพติดเอาเหมือนกัน) ถ้าชอบเกมแนว TD ราคาถูกๆ เกมนี้ผมแนะนำเลยครับ คุ้มค่าจริงๆ

author: {'steamid': '76561197991257362', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 2008, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2008, 'last_played': 1430425617}

author: {'steamid': '76561198032900102', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 1179, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1179, 'last_played': 1430416361}
review: Great [u]challenging[/u] tower defence game. The levels resemble organs or various body parts. The minions are diseases, you for instance fight cancer or flu. I chuckled when I saw nicotine and colesterol :) I've played over 20 hours and I'm still not done with all the levels (on all three difficulties). The only drawback is that there are some bugs with the achievements, however it gets fixed as the developer constantly updates the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061049806', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1681, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1517, 'last_played': 1448294387}

author: {'steamid': '76561197984413896', 'num_games_owned': 3987, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 1430081643}
review:
Hallo zusammen,
hier eine kleine Review zu einem Lustigem Tower Defense Game

Ich hab zwar erst knapp 3 Std auf dem Tacho , aber ich muss sagen das Spiel macht richtig Spass. Als kleiner Helfer im Menschlichem Körper zu helfen um die Bösen Bösen Krankheiten fernzuhalten ist ne nette Idee und man kann auch die kleinen unter dem Zocker Nachwuchs mal ranlassen oder wem War einmal das Leben zu kompliziert war ;) . 
Mein Fazit:
- nette Animation der Erreger der Krankheiten
- netter Sound ( Obwohl das Quietschen der Erreger nach 1 Stunde nerven kann ) 
- Viel Spass für wenig Geld
- Hoher Wiederspielwert
- Eigener Superheld 

Ich habe mir das Spiel in einem Weekalong Sale gekauft für 1,19€ würde aber auch im Nachhinein 4,99€ zahlen den für den Preis ist es okay. Da hab ich schon schlimmere gesehen für den Preis in der Genre Klasse Tower Defense

Ich gebe dem Spiel 10/10
Ein klarer Kauftipp von mir wer Tower Defense mag

author: {'steamid': '76561198003702727', 'num_games_owned': 1306, 'num_reviews': 283, 'playtime_forever': 195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 195, 'last_played': 1430340764}
review:
Otro tower defense salido del mismo molde que el 99% de los que pululan por el mercado. La única novedad reside en la acción, reubicada ahora dentro del cuerpo humano. El jugador deberá decidir la estrategia con la que combatir toda clase de bichejos que tratan de infectarnos. Un planteo que, por su aspecto visual, recuerda de lejos a los dibujos animados de "Érase una vez... el cuerpo humano", pero cuya pobreza gráfica y falta de personalidad hace que no pase de ese punto. Como ya han apuntado otros usuarios, un "Kingdom Rush" dentro del organismo.

Gráficos muy, muy justito y música interesante las dos primeras veces. Los efectos de sonido son repetitivos y los escenarios están más muertos que la p*cha de un viejo.

Conceptualmente no es más que un juego de tableta que ha sido portado a PC con rapidez y nulo cuidado, en tanto en cuanto incluso los textos y gráficos usados para guiar al usuario delatan su origen portátil.

A pesar de todo, está bien para echar el rato, no siendo especialmente cargante ni insufrible. Un aprobadillo y que se dé por satisfecho. En el futuro no seré tan magnánimo con estos sucedáneos que sólo saben copiar y nunca innovar. Que una cosa es reírle la gracia a este tipo de juegos y otra hacernos todos amigos e irnos de farra.

Si lo consigue muy barato, pílleselo y no ponga muchas expectativas. En cualquier otra circunstancia, no lo compre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198131265002', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 954, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 954, 'last_played': 1429901940}
review:
这款游戏还是值得一玩的, 我是打折的时候1刀买的, 花了15个小时完成了所有成就. 但是并不是每关的三种难度都完成了.

其实这游戏和Kingdom Rush还是有点像的. 我这里说下不同的地方
1. 英雄很单一, 越贵的越好. 但是可以加属性点, 血量,攻击,速度（还是很单一）
2. 个别关卡还是比较特别的,比如最后大脑的奖励关卡和大腿关.
3. 个别建筑点上会有加成,比如范围增加30%.有好有坏,玩熟悉了,有些地方很明显你就知道应该造什么
4. 炮塔并不是总打第一个怪,这个很好.比如优先攻击最弱的怪.举个例子,一群怪里混了个加血的.如何让这个加血的被最先秒掉.
5. 可以手动标记优先打哪个怪.这个很好
6. 其实塔的类型并不是和 kingdom rush完全一样.还是有创新的
7. 每关会给宝石（可以反复刷）,宝石可以买一些额外的奖励帮助你过关,比如多500块钱.

这个游戏还是要耗费一点脑筋的,个别关卡的难度很高. 我最后几个小时都耗在大脑关卡了. 想各种搭配.最后终于理解了塔的配合才过.还是很开心的. 为这一点就值回票价了 LOL. 提示, 好好理解如何搭配加农和电磁.我大脑关最后什么加成都没用,22颗红心过关的.

最后,值得一买.也可以等下次打折再买 LOL

author: {'steamid': '76561198053570068', 'num_games_owned': 1777, 'num_reviews': 138, 'playtime_forever': 2060, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2059, 'last_played': 1491751870}
review:
Defend ur Life -  игра жанра TD на медицинскую тематику. 

Идея 8/10 (нас ждут уровни по различным органам и участкам человеческого тела)
Реализация 9/10 (приятная глазу графическая составляющая, симпатичные башни, герои, продумана упрощенная, но все же система, лвлапа персонажей, разнообразие вражеских юнитов)
Хардкорность 9/10 (чего только стоит 160 волн уровня Brain)

Для более быстрого получения ачивмента Super Hero [spoiler] необязательно повышать лвл у одного персонажа, 50 лвл рассчитывается как сумма лвлов всех твинков [/spoiler]

Итого 9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198071293483', 'num_games_owned': 230, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 58, 'last_played': 1436036849}
review:
Po grafické stránce pěkná hra, bohužel hratelnost to odsrala. Vlezte si na první defensi hru na superhrách a máte o zábavu postaráno, nebude to sice po grafické stránce tak pěkné ale zabavíte se více než při této hře. Žádné taktizování od hry nečekejte, Rozlišení má asi jen HD 720p.
Hodnocení: 10/100

author: {'steamid': '76561197992886766', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 360, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 314, 'last_played': 1432191421}
review:
Looked silly at first but this is quite a decent TD game! Honestly, though, if you've played Kingdom Rush then you'll have a very good idea about how this game plays since Defend Your Life is HEAVILY "inspired" by KR. Like KR on Steam, Defend Your Life has recieved a few PC features such as hotkeys and various resolution settings (though they are pretty basic and it doesn't support widescreen w/o black bars and rebinding of hotkeys).

Anyways, Defend Your Life has a nice amount of content - enemy types, levels and other such things like Heroes and an Upgrade tree are all rather robust. You also have 3 "super powers" you can use that do a good job of letting you turn the tides if they're used well.

Despite being a mobile port to PC, Defend Your Life is a nifty little TD game and worth the price if you enjoy non-mazing TD games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015883050', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 745, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 432, 'last_played': 1431738241}
review: Nice tower defense, felt very similar to Kingdom Rush series which I liked

author: {'steamid': '76561198038963412', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 91, 'playtime_forever': 135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1430209898}
review:
3/10 just not cutting it.
There are a lot of TD games out there. Some are pretty good games by any standard.
Some are lazy half-assed mobile ports.
This is definitely the latter. 
The game itself is fairly standard, but lacking. 4 tower types with very limited upgrade routes for each, fairly cliche creeps, the "help from above" drag and drop weapons, etc. What it lacks in imagination, it makes up for in incompetent execution. Text boxes literally cut out mid letter, there are no graphical options, no fullscreen, nothing like that. It does actually work without constantly crashing, and it's OK for a while, but it just doesn't bring anything new or impressive.
TLDR: 
IF you see this game at a HEAVY discount
ANDIF you already own LITERALLY every other TD game on steam
ANDIF you've played them ALL right through.
THEN replay Kingdom Rush, and give the money you saved not buying this game to a random stranger, because the look on their face when you do will be 1000 times more entertaining than this game and stay with you longer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014766672', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 398, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 209, 'last_played': 1429465171}
review:
[h1]This game was reviewed using a code sent by the developer.[/h1]

Defend Your Life is a cute little Tower Defence game with an interesting take on things. The whole game takes place in the human body, as you work your way around the body, you encounter plenty of different enemies with some really interesting abilities. 

One of the major issues I found here is there is certainly some technical issues still going on, load times are pretty bad, even when the game is installed on an SSD, I was often at a load screen for 15 seconds or so. Another issue I encountered was in the later games when your screen is full of defence towers, was the horrendously bad fps drops, they were so bad at times, that it caused me to lose the level.  I would also of liked to have seen an options menu included to be able to change a couple of options such as windows mode, resolution etc. without having to exit the game altogether. 

I did like how the game sort of prompts you to go back and get replay previous missions for extra points (tablets in this game), as it is pretty much impossible to progress at some points without going back to farm extra tablets to upgrade your abilities and towers. 

Hopefully the technical issues can be ironed out, and if they can, then Defend Your Life is an excellent tower defence title, I will still recommend it now, because after all, I played it for almost four hours and still had a really good experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561197964147328', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 952, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 952, 'last_played': 1429741514}
review:
For $5 this game isn't worth it. The easy levels are boring run-of-the-mill tower defense. After this, they do add "heroes", but the hard levels get way to frustrating due to the complete lack of PC-friendly features (namely hotkeys). Its obvious the makers ported the game to PC with no attempt to cater to the PC. 

They did add achievements - but every time you get an achievement (which is VERY often), they cover up your special ability buttons. There is also no fullscreen option (only ~3:4 ratio). The game also uses "running at 2X speed" as one of the ways to make it harder - turning the game into a test of how fast you can click all over the place. This is even more excruciating when it doesn't let you click on your hero for whatever reason.

Bottom line: If you enjoy point and clicking everything, this might be for you. Otherwise, either wait until its on sale, or let this one go.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989230642', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 898, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 898, 'last_played': 1429436232}
review:
Bien qu'il n'ait rien qui lui permette de se démarquer des autres Tower Defence, Defend Your Life fait correctement son boulot.

Coté gameplay, du classique pur jus. Pour ceux qui ont du mal, il y a la possibilité de farmer les niveaux inférieurs pour augmenter le niveau du héros qui facilite bien la vie.

A quelques exceptions près, le jeu n'est pas vraiment difficile.

Niveau durée de vie, une dizaine d'heures en prenant son temps, pour compléter tous les niveaux, dans toutes les difficultés (ou presque, genre le niveau Brain). Les accros aux succès Steam n'auront également aucun problème à le finir à 100%.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003472593', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1696706967}
review:
Il s'agit d'un clone, je devrais dire un plagiat, de Kingdom Rush. Le thème rappelant "il était une fois la vie" pourrait être sympa si le jeu ne passait pas complètement à côté. On défend l'organisme contre des maladies avec... des bombes, des mitrailleuses, des mortiers, des tourelles tesla ?? Qu'est-ce que ça veut dire... Total ratage au niveau du design semblant s'adresser à des enfants de 4/8 ans, ce qui est peut-être effectivement le cas... Mais alors sans poésie, sans style. Vraiment très pauvre, repoussant même.

La stratégie, bah... c'est du déjà vu, et les tableaux ne sont vraiment pas créatifs non plus. Ajoutons à ça l'absence de bulles "tooltip" pour vous donner des détails en cours de jeu, et on finit par ne plus se casser la tête, puisque c'est simple comme un jeu d'enfant on met des tours partout, on gagne et puis voilà, et vu que les fans de tower defense en ont vu d'autres, peut-être qu'ils s'accrocheront un peu s'ils ont du temps à perdre, mais ce n'est pas mon cas. J'ai immédiatement vu le copié-collé basé sur kingdom rush qui m'a vite repoussé, alors que j'aimais le jeu cité, mais là non... C'est moche, sans inspiration, et il me semble que steam ne manque pas de jeux de qualité si vous voulez passer une demie heure de désoeuvrement de temps en temps...

A éviter à moins que vous ayez un besoin vital d'un fix de tower defense. Le jeu n'échoue pas dans ce domaine, il se contente juste d'être inintéressant et simpliste.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999154893', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 108, 'playtime_forever': 791, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 754, 'last_played': 1492429356}
review:
Ve své podstatě klasická tower defense hra. Co jí odlišuje od ostatních je výborný nápad boje těla proti nemocem, virům a spoustě dalších nepřátel organismu. 

Druhů věží jsou sice jen 4 typy, ale ty se ještě rozdělují do různých větví rozvoje. Co se zdá ze začátku snadnou hříčkou později nabírá na solidní obtížnosti zvláště u misí na Hard obtížnost kdy stačí aby prošla jedna jednotka obranou a je konec mise. Hráč si projde celé tělo a zavítá do všech důležitých orgánů. Zpracování každé mise se pak odvíjí podle místa výskytu a objevují se zde i nemoci a noví nepřátelé. Např v plicích se poprvé setkáme nikotinovou jednotkou apod. 

A právě nové prostředí a nemoci s ním spojené rozvíjí hru a nutí hráče měnit strategii. Tuhle se objeví jednotka co je imunní na tesla věže, jinde zas protivník který bez problému na jednu ránu zlikviduje pozemní jednotky včetně vašeho hrdiny. Toho ze začátku dostanete základního, ale později za našetřené diamanty lze koupit lepší a silnější. 

Za tyto peníze které se dostávají za splněné mise se dají dokupovat i bonusy do dalších misí. Navíc hráč získává i tablety které slouží k rozvoji schopností, větší účinnost věží atd...

Je to jednoduchý koncept a celá hra je příjemně návyková, jinak si nedokáži vysvětlit jak už jsem v ní dokázal strávit přes 11 hodin.

Hodnocení 80%

author: {'steamid': '76561198088911662', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 817, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 313, 'last_played': 1431103758}
review:
El mejor Towers Defense que he jugado en los últimos años. Y además por 0,99€...

Mucha variedad de torres y enemigos, tienes un heroe que va subiendo de nivel y puedes ir comprando diferentes con diamantes que consigues en las misiones. También compras mejoras pasivas que mejoran tus torres, el oxigeno (monedas) que te dan los enemigos al matarlos y unas habilidades que podemos ir usando a lo largo de la partida y que se van regenerando cada cierto tiempo. 

Engancha muchísimo.

review:

Bref, un jeu où j'y passe de très bons moments, on s'éclate bien, où l'on est curieux d'explorer ce corps humain. 
Je pense que comme moi (le nostalgique 25+), on aura sans doute en tête la musique de "Il était une fois la vie..."

En tout cas, j'ai fais une ptite vidéo manière de montrer un peu le gameplay si ça intéresse ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198036313514', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 666, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 577, 'last_played': 1596226047}
review:
Отличная игра в своём стиле.
+ 4 башни + 1 добывающая (каждую можно улучшить десяток раз)
+ Интересная задумка врагов и башенок
+ Хороший и интересный сюжет
+ За такую цену ( со скидкой) вполне окупается.
+ Отличный магазин улучшений.
+ Есть Герои, с помощью которых можно пройти не выполнимое.

Всего 1 минус: Довольно быстро проходится 10ч максимум для 3-х сложностей.

8\10

author: {'steamid': '76561197994741576', 'num_games_owned': 522, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 1113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1006, 'last_played': 1429535561}
review:
Juego del tipo "Tower defense" (Defender un punto al cual no pueden llegar las unidades) y la verdad que es un juego muy bueno con muchos modos de dificultad, bastantes tipos de torretas y configuraciones de las mismas, una sección de pasivas que las consigues al recibir monedas tras pasarte niveles, contratar a un héroe para que te ayude y bastantes cositas curiosas.
El juego es con gráficos muy coloridos y sin ninguna agresividad por lo que para niños no es problema. 
9/10. Yo lo compré por 80 céntimos pero incluso por los 5€ que cuesta vale bastante la pena.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994125600', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1428743099}

author: {'steamid': '76561198148698584', 'num_games_owned': 792, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3691, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3396, 'last_played': 1537812740}
review:
I've spent all my holiday playing this game. It's very awesome for just 1 USD (80% off). 

Some levels are extremely hard especially the heart and the brain ones because there are so many high speed units with high HP but I can manage to pass them all thanks to my ultimate weapon (toxic spill factory spamming.) XD

If you are looking for a decent TD, this game is recommended for you. 

8.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198017321822', 'num_games_owned': 1966, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1242, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1203, 'last_played': 1430150815}
review:
Puppy jde hrát (2) - Defend Your Life -> 3/5

Dobře, protože jsem hru dostal, cítím povinnost okomentovat ji a případně doporučit.

Defend Your Life jsem hrál 4 hodiny a budu v tom pokračovat. Hra vypadá hezky a hudbu to má taky fajn, navíc jsem milovníkem různých Tower Defense her. I když je to jedna kopie vedle druhé, vyplnit čas umí každá (hlavně když jede v okně - DYL jede). Co se mi na hře líbí, je obtížnost, která graduje a časem se musíte vracet ke starším levelům, abyste nasbírali tablety na další vylepšení. Paradoxně obtížnost je také věc, která mě na hře strašně sere. Ne, že bych neměl rád těžké hry, ale tady mi přijde, že laťku uměle navyšuje nepřívětivé ovládání a hlavně absence klávesových zkratek. Pokusím se všechno nějak shrnout do pár bodů.

+ U věží se mi líbí šipka, která nám ukazuje, zda je možné věž vylepšit, a také, jestli na vylepšení máme kyslík. Uvítal bych možnost upgradu věže na jeden klik po kliknutí na tu šipku.

+ Čeština je fajn, mohly byste ale přeložit i další tlačítka ve hře (upgrades, heroes, shop).

+ Původně jsem si myslel, že je hra velkou kopírkou Kingdom Rush s minimem přidaných věcí. Vypadá to ale, že tam nějaká přidaná hodnota bude. Líbí se mi třeba funkce zrychlení hry při zvolené těžší obtížnosti. Bohužel mě to často frustruje skrze nepovedené ovládání, viz níže.

- hotkeys: Jak už jsem psal, klávesové zkratky na 3 hlavní skilly jsou velkým nedostatkem, zejména ve chvíli, kdy je hra na těžší obtížnost zrychlená a hodně záleží na rychlé a přesné aktivaci bomby/injekce/elektriky. Stejně tak by se hodila zkratka ("+") pro označení hrdiny.

- ovládání hrdiny: Hrdina se pěkně blbě ovládá a často se mi stalo, že potvora kolem něj jen proběhla a on jí ani nezaregistroval. U kola na hard, kde máte jen jeden život, to dokáže pěkně nasrat. Taky se mi nelíbí, že po smrti běží hrdina na místo, kde zemřel. Cooldown trvá nějakou dobu a dávno potřebuju hrdinu někde jinde. Naklikávat však naspeedovaného blbečka a posílat někam jinam je často nad mé nervy. Po smrti by měl jít na místo, kde stál na začátku levelu. Stejně tak nechápu, proč není cooldown do respawnu ukázaný na jeho portrétu stejně jako u skillů.

- prodej budov: Několikrát, zrovna když jsem to nejméně potřeboval, se mi stalo, že jsem chtěl postavit budovu na místo kousek pod postavenou budovou. V rychlosti jsem se ale "omylem" překlikl a místo toho prodal tu budovu původní. Neptejte se mě, jak jsem to dokázal, ale stalo se to vícekrát. Líbilo by se mi, kdyby tam bylo ještě nějaké potvrzení toho, že chci budovu prodat.

- skipování načítání vlny: Tady nechápu moc význam přerušení čekací doby. Ano, dostanu sice bonusový kyslík, ale ten mlýnek, co kyslík produkuje - hlavně, když ho upgradnu - mi dá zhruba stejně kyslíku (nepočítal jsem to) za dobu, co nechám vlnu načítat. Navíc se mi dobíjí skilly. Přesto většinou tuto funkci používám, a to protože mě u některých levelů prostě nebaví čekat. Ne však z důvodu nějakých výhod. Doporučil bych alespoň částečný reset cooldownů u skillu nebo něco podobného.

- primární cíle věží: Přijde mi, že je to trochu nelogicky vyřešené. Věže střílí buďto do nejslabší nebo nejsilnější jednotky. Prioritu by ale měla mít vždy jednotka nejblíže konce. Hodila by se možnost jakéhosi přepínače, abych si mohl v případě potřeby přepnout střelbu na nejrychlejší jednotku. Často mi utekli ti psi jen díky tomu, že věž se zabývala nějakou rýmou na začátku úrovně.

- hraní na easy: Levely se musí vždy nejdříve projet na easy, potom na medium a pak na hard. Rád bych, aby byla možnost odehrát level rovnou na medium či na hard. Na easy jsou první levely celkem nuda a jde jen o povinné průchody, u kterých se ani moc nebavím. Tablety se mohou přičítat, tj. easy level za 4tb, medium za 2tb - hráč by za průchod medium obtížnosti dostal 6 tablet.


Těch mínusů je sice více, přesto bych hru doporučil. Když ovládáte své nervy, tak je to zábava na několik hodin. navíc je to hra od českých tvůrců, které bychom měli podporovat. Já, když už ne koupí, je podporuji touto recenzí a věřím, že na některých bodech, které jsem vypsal, zapracují. A nebo už to dávno opravují :).

author: {'steamid': '76561198026913459', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 588, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 588, 'last_played': 1429495704}
review:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z66x308ZfMw

This is a free to play mobile game so obviously if you have a cell phone you can just download the free full version and see if you really like it.  The $4.00 is really just to bypass micro transactions in the game which are.... not really all that necessary.  I finished the game on all difficulties in a single playthrough with relative ease.  People who don't play tower defense games may struggle a bit, but in terms of difficulty, it's not so bad.  But when I went to the mobile version I noticed that it was actually mildly more difficult because of awkward touch controls.

The game does import some of the awkward touch mechanics from mobile.  Unfortunately playing it on an actual touch screen like mine just doesn't really work all that well.  Instead you use a mouse and deal with input lag.

The most unusual choice was to release it on PC with all of the crucial buttons being at the bottom right of the screen.  Steam users know this as the default location for announcements for achievements and friends to appear.  It's always fun when you're playing and all of your abilities are covered up by achievement spam.

Honestly it's probably not even worth $4.00.  There are better tower defenses on Steam, Speedrunners 2 was also a mobile port but it's far better.  Get that one instead.

Edit: They developers for the game added some "PC friendly features."  They added 1080P... sort of.  Instead of having native 1080P they just added black on the sides of the screens... looks like a square still.  Thankfully it's now playable on PC which is still an improvement.  It still suffers from a lot of the mobile issues.  You are forced to use the micro transactions store to progress.  The micro transactions don't cost money, but it is a currency that will eventually run out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027195149', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 823, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 586, 'last_played': 1430870373}
review:
Wow 80% off right at release. For $1 dollar you cannot got wrong here. I would have easily paid 5-10 dollars for this game. There is nothing new introduced here, and with the exception of the theme, it resembles Kingdom Rush. It is very solid gameplay that sticks to the basics. Very well polished and converted from tablet (I assume) to PC very nicely. 

Definitley give this game a try! 9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198046915762', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 685, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 540, 'last_played': 1429411228}
review:
[h1]概要[/h1]
人間の体内をモチーフとしたカジュアルTD。15＋ボーナス1ステージがそれぞれ臓器に対応。臓器が舞台とあってウィルスや線虫、ニコチン、胆石、ガン等と戦う事になり中々ユニーク。侵攻ルートの管理は不可となりタワーも定められた場所以外に設置が出来ないが自キャラクターが操作可能。クリア報酬によってPerkや消費アイテムを購入して強化を図れる点などカジュアルでありながら基本を外さない作りとなっている。TDとしての概要や見た目からフォーラムや他レビューでも[url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/246420/]Kingdom Rush[/url]のようだと言及されているが確かにプレイフィールは似通っている。よって同作が楽しめた人には気軽に楽しめるTDになる可能性は高い。ちなみにクリア迄は9時間程度。

[h1]Android/iOS版との相違[/h1]
Steamでは定価が￥498。下記リンクの通りモバイル版はAndroid/iOS両プラットフォームとも無料。違いとしては無料版に比べてSteam版は強力なキャラクターをアンロックするのが容易となっている点のみ。解像度は最大1280☓960迄しかサポートされておらず、デフォルトで日本語対応ではあるが所詮カジュアルTDのため英語を必要とするゲーム性でもない。更に一部は奇妙な訳がなされており自分は英語の方がプレイしやすかった程。これら踏まえると無料版に比べて500円余分に支払う価値があるかと言えば残念ながら見当たらない。とはいえ近日中にトレカ対応予定でもあり、ゲームとしてもTD好きには気軽に楽しめる内容のためストアリリース時の99円程度であれば十分コストパフォーマンスとしては高いと言えるだろう。
[url=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.aldagames.dyl&hl=ja]Android版[/url]
[url=https://www.google.co.jp/search?hi=ja&lr=lang_ja&ie=utf-8&tbo=1&q=android%20defend%20your%20life#lr=lang_ja&tbs=lr:lang_1ja&q=ios+defend+your+life]iOS版[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198021974257', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 456, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 456, 'last_played': 1429226336}
review:
Bought this game for €0.99. Quite possibly the single best purchase of my entire life. Hours can fly by when playing this. Each level has Easy/Medium/Hard difficulty. The first few levels are deceptively easy on the first 2 difficulty settings. But after the first boss..... easy ain't so easy anymore O_O

Do I like this game? No. I LOVE this game. So many different enemy and tower units. Beautiful graphics. Options are limited at the start but the deeper you go into the game, the greater the amount of things you unlock (upgrades and such).

A smart and charming tower defence game.

10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198098210913', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 834, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 708, 'last_played': 1430290136}
review:
一款以自己身体防御病毒细菌的入侵为背景的一款塔防游戏，游戏的画风也不错，作为一款打折1刀的游戏来说可谓良心。
游戏整体的难度还是有的，可玩性也比较高。玩了4小时，还没玩到四分之一，而且越到后面难度也直线上升。游戏中也有技能点，召唤英雄的设定，这给游戏也添加了不少可玩性与难度。
总体来说是一款不错的塔防游戏。

author: {'steamid': '76561198068032550', 'num_games_owned': 3295, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1471785583}
review: Забавная и довольно простая игра в стиле Tower Defense. Суть - защита человеческого организма от различных микробов, начиная с самый медлительных и слабых и заканчивая бронированными мутирующими бактериями и вирусами. Есть одно но - игра дико тормозит при большом количестве двигующихся объектов на игровом поле.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119371103', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 188, 'last_played': 1428960469}
review:
Dann mal schreib ich auch mal was dazu

Kurze Version: Wenn man sich das Spiel unbedingt kaufen möchte: NUR im Sale, und NUR wenns UNTER 1,00€ is... mehr is rausgeschmissenes Geld... gibt wesentlich bessere Flashgame-klone die man gratis im Internet spielen kann...

Lange Version: Ich kann ja verstehen dass nach "Kindom Rush" (KR) viele versuchen auf den Zug aufzuspringen... 
Leider hab ich schon wesentlich besser Kopien auf diversen Online-Spieleplattformen (AG hust hust) gesehen, die sogar gratis waren. 

"Defend your Life" (DyL) ist so ziemlich der billigste KR-Klon den ich bisher spielen durfte und es grenzt meiner Meinung nach eigentlich schon an eine Frechheit dafür überhaupt Geld zu verlangen...
aber gut, im Sale für 0,99€ komm, die schenk ich dem entwickler... soller glücklich werden damit.

Pro: es ist recht witzig gestaltet, das kann man schon mal so sagen...

Kontra(s): 
- bei jedem Start ein "Settings"-Bildschirm - "Grafikeinstellungen" schön und gut, aber mal ehrlich... meine Kiste kommt nichtmal auf bester einstellung ins schwitzen...
- die "Tastaturbelegung" ist mal sowas von dermaßen unnütz... wofür macht man ne Tastatureinstellung wennse letztenendes nicht funk...?!
- wo wir schon beim nächsten Punkt sind: sogar die gratis-Flashgame-Plattformen habens geschafft das man die KR-Klone mit Tastatur nutzen kann - Spezialfähigkeiten sind an ne Taste gekoppelt, bei Linksklick auf einen Bauplatz kann man den Turm alternativ auch mit der dazugehörigen Taste bauen, "U" für "Upgraden"; "S" für "Sell" usw... hoffe das wird  IRGENDWANN mal nachgereicht... es ist nur minimalst frustrierend wenn man nen Map verliert weil man um nen verdammten Pixel außerhalb des klickbaren bereichs eines Turmbuttons klickt... 
- hier einige Vorschläge: 
-- 1: Bombe; 2: Elektroschock; 3: Adrenalin; wenn nen Bauplatz ausgewählt ist: W: Korpuskel-Turm; A: Thrombozyten-Kaserne; S: Bombarde; D: Vitamin-Fabrik; U: Upgrade; S: Verkaufen; wenn mehrere Upgrades zur verfügung stehen: Q/W/E oder U gedrückt halten und 1/2/3 oder suchts euch aus...
- einige Beschreibungen fehlen (das beginnt zB schon bei den Symbolen bei den Türmen: welcher Wert bedeutet was, wär schön wenn wenigstens in der Wiki was dabei stehen würd, ich mein, gut, wenn man nicht auf den Kopf gefallen ist kann man sichs ja selber denken, aber für Leute die halt nicht gerne Denken... davon kenn ich leider mehr als genug... wäre zumindest ein "nice to have"), deutsche Synchro is kannst vergessen, entweder schlecht oder garnicht übersetzt... 

Kaufempfehlung... wie bereits oben geschrieben: NUR im Sale, und nur wenns weniger als 1,00€ kostet, mehr is rausgeschmissenes Geld...
ganz ehrlich..
schöne Grüße
euer Chaos

author: {'steamid': '76561197970390581', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 716, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 606, 'last_played': 1429818462}
review:
Das Spiel ist auf den ersten Blick eigentlich nur eine Kopie von Kingdom Rush mit anderer Grafik. Nahezu alles ist identisch. Nach einer Weile Spielzeit merkt man aber dann, das hier und da noch eine kleine Idee dazu gekommen ist. Auch der Schwierigkeitsgrad ist etwas höher, was ich als positiv empfinde.

TD-Fans können hier nix falsch machen: solide Tower Defense ohne Schnickschnack auf straffem Schwierigkeitsgrad.

Wer etwas Neues im Bereich TD sucht, ist hier falsch. Das Spiel kopiert weitestgehend bestehende TD-Prinzipien, hauptsächlich von Kingdom Rush.

Nur die Performance lässt etwas zu wünschen übrig. Sowohl die Ladezeiten als auch die Performance im Spiel sind nicht der Brüller. Bei erhöhter Spielgeschwindigkeit ruckelt das Spiel merklich, auch Mausinteraktionen werden dann schwieriger (und das auf einem i7 mit GTX 960).

Ich empfehle es trotzdem, da es ein gutes TD-Game ist, und bei Kingdom Rush tut sich ja auch nix Neues.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120330268', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1319, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 915, 'last_played': 1483184274}
review:
What a bargin! I got this game for 1 EUR and it is a really nice TD.
I'm not crazy with the health concept that provides the 'story' for this game, but from a gameplay perspective it is really good. There is nothing new, but it is solid TD with loads of towers, many different type enemies, and a nice set of levels. You replay each level for new challenges - don't let the titles Easy, Middle, Hard fool you - each is a new 'campaign'. You have a hero, and can buy different types. Their skill increases as you play.
In general, this game is a casual Kingdom Rush lite. 

It has really good tutorials and there are videos for each level if you fail, which makes this game an execellent 'TD starter' casual game for people who wants to try TD. 
And it is a casual TD - there are no advanced concepts, developments, or a multitude of levels - but it is casual fun and incredible good value for the money.

author: {'steamid': '76561198092025717', 'num_games_owned': 234, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 593, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 411, 'last_played': 1524146710}
review:
题材新颖玩法多样的塔防游戏而且还有中文版而且还有80%OFF音乐也不错
其实在买之前我就知道有个80%OFF当时有点小闲钱准备喜+1来着
实际体验了一下这游戏真的超赞,有各式各样的炮塔升级 还有提供buff的维生素工厂 兵营里出的是血小板 还有英雄单位叫什么血小板将军我觉得都很有创意 这个英雄单位是可以随意操控的而且有等级 每升一级都可以手动选择要增加的属性 
还有一些做的没那么完美的比如这个炮塔初始就是那种老式火炮 可以升级成电塔和机枪 还有榴弹炮升级成核导弹之类的 这些和血小板士兵那些比起来就显得略失创意了 再说在体内搞核武器真的没问题嘛..
这游戏总体感觉比较难 相比其他的塔防类游戏来说是这样的..对于完美主义者来说一分都不丢可是需要好好动脑子的,有些时候还需要用钻石去商店购买额外的资源才能好打一些..
顺便说一下这游戏没法真正意义上的宽屏玩,全屏后屏幕两侧会有黑边,不过对游戏体验影响不大.
总之这游戏略复杂但是性价比超高,哪怕是原价买我觉得也不亏,也多亏了这次打折要不然根本不知道还有这么一款好玩的小游戏.

author: {'steamid': '76561198103507660', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 1741, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1432, 'last_played': 1435569877}
review:
https://youtu.be/vq6Cse4Dm20

Defend Your Life is a Tower Defence game with the interesting theme of the human anatomy and the various micro-organisms playing the part of your opposition. 

I found the game to be engaging from the off and has personality in droves; the colourful aesthetic combined with the constant new mechanics the game throws at you along a very reasonable enemy variety make for the perfect fusion of a great Tower Defence game! 

If that wasn't enough the low price of the title make it an absolute steal of a game which I could easily see being a top pick of 2015, simple yet well executed!

author: {'steamid': '76561198176783878', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1428857650}
review:
I would recommend this game at the discounted price of $1, and maybe at the normal $5. Although I wouldn't consider myself a veteran of TD games, I have played a few, and nothing about this game really stands out to me. It's cute, charming, good for a few hours of fun; but it wasn't anything that I couldn't walk away from, and now that I've stopped playing it, I don't really have any wish to continue.

I bought it primarily because I thought a TD game based off of the human immune system would be really cool. I was expecting a game where I could control all sorts of white blood cells to kill foreign viruses and bacteria. However, the game really doesn't follow this theme very well. For starters, your arsenal towers consist of the tesla (which is literally a metallic tower with an orb that fires electrical pulses), the cannon (again, literally a cannon resembling a tank or a machine gun), and the bomber (which fires literal cannon balls). Now, the cannon balls do visible damage to your body on the map, but this doesn't affect the game whatsoever. It's just an aesthetic effect. I think that's a real shame; it wouldn't have been very difficult to incorporate some kind of health meter for the body. When our immune systems fend off invading microbes, we do damage to our own cells as well, and that can lead to a lot of problems. So it wouldn't be inaccurate at all to impose on players the need to balance killing the infecting virus and bacteria without doing too much damage to the body. The currency in the game is oxygen, which is generated by a windmill. And there is a vitamin factory (which provides a boost to your melee towers), but it looks like some tower you'd see in a space station or some alien colony. You can even employ a hero such as the Hulk or a Lumberjack to run around inside your blood vessels. 

The worst part of it is that the enemies are all legitimate viruses and bacteria, and the path they're traveling through is the blood vessels. So the overall effect is that you're inside your body, there are viruses and bacteria circulating through your system, and you're blowing them up with machine guns. And let's not forget the Lumberjack--inside your blood vessel--sawing his way through everything. There is such an odd disynchrony between the towers and the enemies, and it makes no sense. It just doesn't work at all. If you're thinking of buying this game because you, too, are allured by the whole human physiology aspect, prepare to be disappointed.

I believe that there are 17 levels in total, in different areas of the human body (lungs, stomach, kidneys, intestines, etc). I've already played through 7 or 8, and I'm still not fully done the tutorial, i.e. there are still features and upgrades I have yet to unlock. This should also speak for the length of the game (my playtime of 2.2 hours is accurate). The background art is well drawn, and does reflect the different parts of the body well; but the different maps are all very similar and I stopped paying attention to them at about the third or fourth level. The soundtrack is unremarkable, and I can remember nothing I want to say about it. The selection of towers is pitiful (I've already described every unit you can build in the game except one). And one thing that really annoyed me is that the level limitations don't change regardless of your difficulty setting. So, level one, easy: you obviously don't have all your towers or upgrades. That's fine. But once you advance in the game and go back to play level one on medium or hard, you still have only the same towers and upgrades as you did in the easy setting. Nothing you unlocked later on in the game is available to you. This greatly annoyed me, and makes it very difficult to win the more advanced levels. Again, I will say that I'm no TD veteran, so perhaps this would pose no challenge to you; but I do believe that players should have access to everything they've unlocked through their progress. For me, at least, it destroys replayability.

This game also has Steam pop ups for achievement progression. Not only that, but there are progression notifications for several achievements at once. So once you kill 100 viruses, expect a pop up that tells you you are 100/1000 to earning the first achievement, 100/2000 to earning the second, and 100/4000 to earning the third. The notifications convienently block access to some very important buttons, and if you get more than three at once, the entire game screen blacks out until the pop ups disappear. I don't feel like disabling my achievement notifications for one game. Devs, please fix this.

I can't speak for how well the game runs. I have a brand new 2015 laptop, so if I can't run a game like this, I don't expect that anyone would be able to. And, then again, considering how basic this game is, there really shouldn't be performance issues.

As I said in the beginning, I do recommend it if you can get it on sale. It's certainly not a polished game, but it's still a functional TD at heart once you get past all the inconsistencies and how generic it is. If you're looking for a break from other games, give this a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002342605', 'num_games_owned': 2060, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 1160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1112, 'last_played': 1429426149}
review:
ほぼKingdom Rush。えっそこまでKingdom Rushと同じなの？大丈夫？ってぐらい。Kingdom RushはWeb版だけでもネタありチャレンジありの素晴らしいTDなので是非遊んで欲しい。

本作のちょっと変わってるのはタワーの攻撃順位が並び順ではなく基本的に体力で判断すること。配置次第では後方のい敵を狙いゴール直前の敵を素通りさせたりする。

慣れたシステムでちょっと変わったものを遊びたい人にはよろしいかと。

author: {'steamid': '76561198050171135', 'num_games_owned': 963, 'num_reviews': 118, 'playtime_forever': 407, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 353, 'last_played': 1493651629}
review:
Купил за 25 рублей, так что обзор положительный =)

Defend Your Life это незамысловатый Tower Defense. Больше всего напоминает Kingdom Rush, но конечно же на много проще. Поле боя - организм человека. В виде обороны выступает наш иммунитет. В виде врагов различные микробы и болезни. Так же как и в Kingdom Rush здесь можно вызывать войска, в роли которых выступят менты-тромбоциты. Башни соответственно улучшаются, во время игры можно использовать способности и бусты. В игре так же есть донатерские расходники, но не бойтесь, доната в игре нет. Валюта за которую покупаются расходники даётся после каждой удачной игры.

Вообще это порт с Андройда, если интересно можете найти в Гугл-маркете. Если любите Tower Defense то хватайте эту игру по скидке, несколько часов фана вам обеспечено.

P.S. Кристалы особо не тратьте, после 6ой миссии дадут первого героя. Остальные покупаются за кристалы.

author: {'steamid': '76561198140908439', 'num_games_owned': 623, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 242, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 167, 'last_played': 1482563808}
review:
风格很独特的塔防游戏。扮演人体内的防线阻挡病菌入侵。
虽然不得不说游戏模式有类似Kingdom Rush的影子，但并不妨碍它以有趣的内容给予玩家良好的体验。谈不上抄袭。
塔的属性和怪物属性并没有什么大的创新，但在身体环境中为他们赋予了独特的角色，病菌、红细胞等风格都比较可爱。
虽说有简体中文，但是只有文本内容完成了汉化，游戏按钮等贴图中的文字仍然是英文，不过我相信不会有人被困在那种初级英文单词上吧。
我是打折0.99刀买的，但说实话，即使花费4.99刀购买这样一款游戏对塔防爱好者来说都不亏。除非你是个盗版爱好者，不过这样不尊重游戏的人何必要来Steam呢？ :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197999566518', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 307, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 307, 'last_played': 1428790615}
review:
I suppose the tower defence benchmarks are Defense Grid 1 and 2. The developers of Defend Your Life clearly put no thought into the title, however it's great fun to play and they clearly have put plenty of thought into the gameplay. Don't let the cartoon style graphics deceive you - just when you think you've got it all worked out, it throws you a few curveballs. I haven't finished the game yet, but 5 hours in and I'm still unlocking new power-ups, so it doesn't get stale too quickly.

The game is based inside the human body and there's weird baddies like "Pro Angina" and "Rabies" (that bark like dogs). Each level is in a different area of the body and fortunately, you wouldn't be able to guess where you were. 

It's all a little bit strange to be honest, and when I got to the bit where I had to click on the semi-autopsied man's crotch, I was quite relieved when it took me to the "Urinary Bladder" level. Weirdness aside, this game is a lot of fun and worth every penny.

I paid £0.79 for this today, but if I'd paid full price, I would still be happy. Give it a go people :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197992807568', 'num_games_owned': 10204, 'num_reviews': 163, 'playtime_forever': 485, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1467793464}
review:
[b]★★★★★★★☆☆☆ - 7/10[/b]

Mein erster Eindruck ist das man für 1€ mit diesem Oldschool-Tower-Defense nichts verkehrt machen kann. Auch gibt es einen Shop zum Aufrüsten und Freischaltbares. Steam-Achievements runden das Gesamtbild ab. Die Grafik ist eher niedlich und für Kids aber das Thema finde ich witzig: Man muss das Immunsystem eines menschlichen Körpers unterstützen.
Einzig negativ ist mir aufgefallen das nur Screenmodes bis 1280x960 unterstützt werden und nur die Musiklautstärke eingestellt werden kann.
Oldschool-Tower-Defense Fans werden auch 5€ nicht bereuen wobei es die Mobile-Version wohl günstiger geben dürfte.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045047577', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 362, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 361, 'last_played': 1430600012}
review:
Fun little mobile tower-defense game.  I can forgive the fact that their port to desktop completely ignores the additional input methods for the desktop (keys, right mouse button), because I bought this for 99 cents.

The graphics are cute, and the music is light and plucky.

Variations on the standard theme: you have a few tower types, plus barracks that provide troops who battle on the path, and heroes whom you can buy and level up.  Heroes also fight on the path.  Enemies engaged by the troops or heroes are slowed while fighting.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006500943', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1429927326}
review:
[b]===// TL;DR Version //===[/b]

A decent but rather generic TD on the cheap.


[b]===// Thorough Version //===[/b]

It's a recommended buy [b]only[/b] if you're looking for a TD fix at a cheap price.
At the moment, when I write this review, it's 80% off.
Otherwise, there's nothing new compared to others in the swathe of TD games on Steam.

If you're looking for something new in terms of mechanics, look elsewhere.

The graphics isn't something to write home about; obvious mobile port is obvious.
The assets are well-drawn, detracting this game from the rest of the run-of-the-mill TD games.
Kinda reminds me of Worms.

It's based on Unity, with the usual Unity launcher and a maximum resolution of...1024x768?
I'm guessing the supported resolutions depend on the max vertical resolution of your display/monitor, which mine is 1366x768 since I'm on a laptop.
It does, however, seem to support multi-display, as in you can decide on which monitor you'd want this game to be displayed in via the Unity launcher.

There are (limited) global upgrades that affects towers' attack & range, tower sell value, specials' effectiveness, and in-level currency-related like how many starting oxygen per level or how much you get per mob kill.
These upgrades are bought using 'tablets', which you can get from finishing a level.
Each level holds a maximum of 7 tablets, which is divided to 3 at Easy, 2 at Medium, and 2 at Hard.
The tablets are finite, but you can easily 'sell' upgrades if you want to put the tablets into other upgrades that you want more.

The specials?
It basically breaks down to the basic three.
A bomb (AoE nuke), electric shock (global nuke), and adrenaline (AoE tower buff).
Yes, that's it.
Specials have infinite usage, though...limited only by their cooldowns.

The in-level currency is oxygen, and the in-game one is crystal.
Oxygen is what you use in a level to build towers.
Crystal is, I'm just guessing here, effectively what you'd buy with real money in the mobile version.
Crystals are used to buy boosters, which either adds oxygen, adds life, adds an extra of your strongest unit, resets all specials' cooldown, and global adrenaline.

Yep, typical freemium boosters.

The Encyclopedia is probably the most dodgy part of the game.
The Enemy details is in-game, but when you click for Tower details, the game opens up your browser to load the related webpage on the game's website.
Tips & Tricks is no different from Tower details.
Others is basically other games made by the game studio, and yes, acts the same way as Tower details.

Keep in mind that this game is a 430-ish MB download and 660-ish MB installed, so I don't really get the technical reason as for why they couldn't just cram everything locally in the Encyclopedia.

My conclusion?
Please refer to the TL;DR section at the top of this review. ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561197992575759', 'num_games_owned': 7837, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 207, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 207, 'last_played': 1429302047}
review:
„Defend Your Life” to gra z rodzaju tower defense. Od razu w oczy rzucają się dwie rzeczy. Po pierwsze widać, że twórcy wzorowali się na „Kingdom Rush”. Trudno mieć o to pretensje. KR w dużym stopniu zdefiniowało ten gatunek. Nie mamy tu jednak na szczęście ślepego powielania rozwiązań z KR . Widać, że ktoś przynajmniej chwilę pomyślał przy projektowaniu gry.  Po drugie jest to konwersja z urządzeń mobilnych. To widać ale to zupełnie nie przeszkadza. Można się czepiać szczegółów takich jak to, że przesuwanie ekranu wymaga „złapania go" myszką ale to specjalnie nie przeszkadza

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lxCcSnuYko4

Ktoś mógłby powiedzieć, że „Defend Your Life” to tylko zmodyfikowany „Kingdom Rush”. Jest w tym sporo racji ale ta modyfikacja jest twórcza i przemyślana. Rozgrywka daje dużo frajdy. Polecam grę każdemu fanowi TD. Aha. Jeszcze jedna ważna uwaga. W wersji PC oczywiście zrezygnowano z mikrotransakcji

http://www.gramator.info.pl/defend-your-life/

author: {'steamid': '76561198222979472', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 72, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1429942211}
review: 山寨版的kingdom rush 从建筑类型到升级模式都一样，画面和音效给我的感觉像是个半成品，0.99刀打折买的,依然觉得不值这个价钱，不推荐

author: {'steamid': '76561198018507857', 'num_games_owned': 1532, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 888, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 888, 'last_played': 1429364218}
review:
Als "Kommandant der Wächter des menschlichen Körpers" ist "Defend your Life" ein Tower Defense Spiel der besonderen Art. Es sieht aus, als wäre es vom Design her an die damalige Serie "Es war einmal der Mensch" angelehnt und wirft uns in ein eher ungewöhnliches Setting. 

Die Spielstruktur läuft hierbei ähnlich ab, wie bei dem Spiel "Kingdom Rush". Wir bauen Türme an vorgegebenen Stellen, Upgraden diese und lösen zwischendurch eine Fertigkeit aus, die unsere Türme z.B. bufft. 
Das Gegnerdesign ist hierbei optisch niedlich und abwechslungsreich, jedoch unterscheiden diese sich Gameplay-Technisch nicht stark von den Gegnern aus anderen TDs. 

Für ein kleines Spiel zwischendurch ist das Spiel gerade für den geringen Preis das Geld wert und kann auf jedenfall damit Punkten.
IGN 11/10

review: 这款塔防游戏动画风格，操作与其他塔防游戏类似，但融入了人的身体，游戏目标是阻止病毒侵入人体，有一些简单的剧情，1刀的价格还算公道。游戏分辨率选择不全，但也并无大碍，总的来说还可以。

author: {'steamid': '76561198058644382', 'num_games_owned': 666, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 665, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 605, 'last_played': 1429941011}
review:
Très bon Tower Defense surtout a ce prix en solde !

Un peu le fils qu'aurait eu kingdom rush et il etait une fois la vie...
C'est plutot joli, les mechanismes du jeu bien que basique tournent très bien. 


Il y'a 4 sortes de tourelles évolutive  :

-La tourelle de base, bonne cadence faible dégats. On peu l'évoluer en tesla pour plus de degat au prix de la cadence ou canon rapide.
-La caserne, qui permet de former des globules qui stop les ennemis qu'ils engagent. Chaque upgrade augmente le nombre et la résistance. 
-l'artillerie, degat de zone, evolue en gros missile pour plus d'impact, ou peut générer un marais toxique qui ralentit.
-L'usine, qui elle a un role de soutient, boostant les autres tourelles dans sa zone. On a le choix entre 3 évolutions, la vitesse, la force ou la portée.

De plus l'on dispose de 3 pouvoirs pouvant être utilisé:

-la bombe, qui explose peu de temps apres avoir été posé, petite zone d'action
- l'electrochoc, qui inflige des dégats a tous les ennemis précent a l'écran
-l'adrenaline, qui permet de booster les tourelles dans une petite zone

A coté de ça, pour chaque niveau on a un générateur qui fournit un apport de ressources régulier (pouvant etre upgrade aussi) et un Héros qui lui aussi prendra de l'expérience et l'on distribue les points entre vitesse, attaque et vie. Il y'a pour le moment 5 héros pouvant être debloqué. 

De plus une fois un niveau achevé l'on reçoit des points a depenser, dans un arbre de competence général. Boost de chaque pouvoir, reduction de leur cd, augmentation de la portée ou dégats des tours, bonus d'argent en début de partie, a la revente des tours ou générer en passif.


Voila donc tout notre arsenal pour combattre tous les virus et autres bactéries qui en veulent a votre corps !

Les 17 niveaux se déroulent à divers endroits du corps, et chacun est décliné en 3 niveaux de difficultés
Et la varieté d'ennemis aura de quoi offrir un bon challenge, entre ceux qui deviennent invisible, se divise, vont plus vite; on a aussi certains qui fusionneront pour devenir plus puissant , d'autre serront hyper résistant, ou bien ... non vous verrez..

Vraiment un très bon TD , si il faut vraiment donner des défauts malgrés son tout petit prix, peut etre la maniabilité du héros, qu'on aurait aimé facilité, ou comme toujours plus de niveaux, ennemis, héros ^^

Et puis vous pourrez apprendre où se situe le cerveau dans un corps.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005299723', 'num_games_owned': 12980, 'num_reviews': 199, 'playtime_forever': 747, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 723, 'last_played': 1477130446}
review:
For such a cheap price at  release i.e. 80% off the usual £3.99, I had more fun playing  this Tower Defense  (TD) game  than I've had playing  a lot of games I've paid 20 times as much for.   Defend Your Life is  a  typical TD game with the usual  tower purchases, for example  upgradeable cannons and   tesla towers,  as well as other towers that  slow units down or toss grenades, plus there are special towers such as  those that give you extra oxygen.  Oxygen is the currency in game  which  allows you to purchase  more towers and  upgrades, plus  at the end of each  level you are awarded  tablets and  diamonds, both of which can be spent  either on  upgrading your tower  defenses or on special  upgrades that can only be used once to  top up  other  defenses that  usually take time to recover such as the electric shock , bomb or adrenaline.

 The theme of this  TD game is  biological, with a human body  being attacked by viruses.  Each level gradually takes you further into the body.   You can set the speed up to four times the normal speed  and/or  select from three different difficulties.  Even at full price  I think Defend Your Life is  a bargain.   I reckon most  TD fans    will enjoy this game and it's also an  excellent  introduction   for those new to the genre. The easy mode is relatively easy to beat.  I played   through several levels  with no losses. The harder levels  give less currency to buy the various upgrades and   the speed of  the viruses  are increased, plus you get less oxygen currency to start with.



With 22 different enenies,  all with different strengths and weaknesses, for example the flu virus  divides into two weaker flu viruses  when it  is  killed  and the Nicotinic unit disappears when  first hit and is immune from attack while invisible, at least from the tower defenses. You can still damage  these with bombs and electric shocks.

There's a tips and tricks section as well as an encyclopedia that  gives you  information  about each building, for example  the Tesla tower  does more damage  for each shot  than any other  tower, but takes a longer  time to recharge.  There are some nice little touches like the defensive towers that  when activated  create little  beings that    don't do actual damage, but block the path of incoming  viruses.  When damaged they  recover  fairly quickly. If destroyed   new ones will replace them before the next wave.  You can  start  the next wave early by clicking on the warning symbol that pops up near the place where the viruses  first appear. The quicker you do this, the more oxygen is added to your total, giving you more currency to  buy or upgrade towers.

The 20 achievements  for this game are  relatively easy to attain, so long as you can survive the waves of viruses.  You can see a video of game play [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7kxQunPNz6o][b]HERE[/b][/url]. I highly recommend this game

author: {'steamid': '76561198049193268', 'num_games_owned': 819, 'num_reviews': 201, 'playtime_forever': 1556, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 488, 'last_played': 1438484435}
review:
« Defend Your Life » est un tower defence au gameplay très inspiré de Kingdom Rush : on a le choix entre 4 types de tours (canon, mortier, baraques, et boost) qui peuvent être améliorées dans différentes branches au choix ; on dispose également d’un héros dont on peut contrôler la position, et de quelques actions utilisables plus ou moins fréquemment (électrocution de tous les ennemis, bombe, boost des tours). On peut également débloquer des améliorations diverses avec des points gagnés en battant les niveaux.

La difficulté "facile" est un peu ennuyeuse au début, mais le jeu nous oblige à finir chaque niveau en facile avant de débloquer ses versions plus difficiles. Au bout d’une ou deux heures on commence à tomber sur des niveaux un peu plus corsés.

En ce qui concerne le tuto, le jeu explique très bien et progressivement tout ce qu’on peut ou doit faire.

Je ne suis pas un fan du style graphique, mais c’est correct et on distingue bien les différents ennemis et les tours. Les sons font leur boulot sans originalité, et la musique gagne à être coupée. Pas de souci technique sinon qu’il faut sélectionner une résolution 4/3 sous peine que des portions du niveau soient parfois cachées hors de l’écran (ou de la fenêtre), sans possibilité de scroller pour les faire apparaitre. Le jeu utilise le moteur Unity.

Vu son prix de 5€ (ou 1€ en promo), je n’ai pas de raison de me plaindre pour l’instant, même s’il n’est à première vue pas aussi bien que Kingdom Rush.

Testé sous Arch Linux 64 bit / Core i5 / GTX 660 / Xfce / Compton.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029859549', 'num_games_owned': 217, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 309, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 159, 'last_played': 1449972815}
review:
INTRODUCTION:
Defend Your Life : tower defense set in human body where players are fighting against villain hordes of viruses and bacteria. Levels and units correspond to reality of human anatomy.  

This is a sweet little tower defense game it has all the essentials for a regular TD but with the extra hero witch helps with leaked enemies and what not, I played through a good portion of easy mode then switched to hard mode witch is rather challenging since you can't leak any enemies. It's definitely worth a buck. The only down side is I wish it was easier to keep your hero involved like w,a,s,d or arrrow keys for his movement and mouse strictly for tower building. Instead you have to click the hero then the location you want him to move and repeat for every movement. But overall it's fun I just keep the hero in the back for leaks and play the rest like a traditional TD. 

PROS:
+ Awesome 2D Graphics
+ Good new story that adds several hours to the game time
+ New enemy types are fun to fight
+ just 1$

CONS:
- nothing

author: {'steamid': '76561197978962100', 'num_games_owned': 2240, 'num_reviews': 516, 'playtime_forever': 760, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 760, 'last_played': 1430704257}
review:
This is a good game for beginners and advanced players of the tower defense genre to play and have fun.  It takes a unique twist because the maps are based off your internal body systems and you are fighting off bacteria and viruses.  You can upgrade your different abilities and specialize differently.  This is a good game for $5 and the fact that it is $1 right now makes it a steal.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040147501', 'num_games_owned': 8529, 'num_reviews': 139, 'playtime_forever': 1078, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 229, 'last_played': 1430213812}
review:
游戏题材很新颖，是一个塔防游戏
游戏将你你的整个身体做成了一副连贯的塔防地图，各种病毒做成了你的敌人，游戏故事和设置非常有趣。
内容上也绝对不空洞，可以自己玩玩体验，说实话，5美金游戏在STEAM上可以找到上千个，很多游戏都因为低成本缺乏内容。这款游戏的性价比绝对良心。（仔细想想那些大作们没事来一发DLC打折后的价格都让你泪流满面吧）

游戏画面大家看商店页面也可以体会到，很Q版的欧美风格。我是觉得挺可爱的，你呢？

游戏自带中文，进去的时候可以选择，不过主页面小部分选项没有翻译，影响不大，都是很基础的单词
如果你硬要说什么 HP，START, MENU，OUT GAME都不认识的话···
我只能说哥，我给你跪下了

author: {'steamid': '76561198136009873', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1394, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1085, 'last_played': 1697834547}
review:
[h1]Tips for game:[/h1]

[b]Shock Wave[/b]
Each explosion provided by artillery shocks enemies and this slow them for a short time.

[b]Breathe Deeply[/b]
Keep upgrading Oxygen Generators. More Oxygen they generate, more resources for buidling and upgrading constructions you have.

[b]Don´t Waste Your Time[/b]
Speed up the time of the game four times before launching the first wave. Your power ups will fully charge earlier.

[b]Platform Discounts![/b]
Unlock Occupied Platforms and use their benefits. Each one offers increased stats like damage, range or attack rate for tower built on the platform.

[b]Benefitial Impatience[/b]
Launch enemy wave earlier and enjoy additional Oxygen as your reward. Because sometimes even impatience is a virtue.

[b]Tablet Addiction[/b]
Play the levels on harder difficulties to gain more tablets. Tablets are essential for buying upgrades and it is quite impossible to pass the game without them.

More tips here: [url]http://defendyourlife.aldagames.com/tips/[url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198006669394', 'num_games_owned': 110, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1700, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 157, 'last_played': 1456836228}
review:
Graficky hodně povedená tower defense hra, která se trochu inspiruje seriálem Byl jednou jeden život, takže hrajete v lidském těle a ničíte bakterie, viry a podobnou havěť. Všechno co byste od TD hry čekali tady je, upgrady, super schopnosti, hrdinové, spousta levelů v několika obtížnostech. Hodně dobré - na mobilu jsem se toho nahrál desítky hodin.

8.5/10
